item.title: User Commitment
item.description: Here at indy100.com we want to make sure that by joining our community of users for whatever reason, whether to comment on our content or receive a more tailored experience, you are clear about what you are signing up for. So we are making this commitment to all of our users:We will always let you k...
item.dc:creator: Indy100 Staff
item.content:encoded:
Here at indy100.com we want to make sure that by joining our community of users for whatever reason, whether to comment on our content or receive a more tailored experience, you are clear about what you are signing up for. So we are making this commitment to all of our users:

  • We will always let you know what information we’d like about you, why we’d like it and what we do with this data.
  • We will always give you something back for doing this.
  • We will always make sure that you are in control of your information.

Related links

  • User Policies
  • Privacy Notice
  • Cookie Notice
  • Code of Conduct
  • Complaint Form
  • Contact Us
  • External Contributors Policy
  • Competition Ts & Cs

Transparency and clarity of information

It’s important to us that we have a good relationship with our users, as we rely on you for feedback, and your habits and behaviours on the Website help us shape our content, so we give you more of what we know you like. If you want to read in detail about how we run the Website and the information we collect please click through to our User Policies, Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy in the Related Links on this article. The main reasons we collect information about you are listed here:

  1. So we can monitor what our users are looking at. This can tell us which of our channels are the most popular, or when users are looking at the Website the most or what devices you are using to watch video. We can tell using your registration information and by using cookies a bit more about you and your interests. If we overlay this insight onto user habits we can make sure we develop new content that we know you will be interested in and that fits your lifestyle.
  2. So we can make your experience of using the Website simple and enjoyable. By remembering who you are when you come back to the Website we can let you share content with your friends without joining again and display content to you which we know you are interested in.
  3. So we can audit the Website using anonymous data collected to tell us how many visitors are using the Website, for how long and where they are coming from.

We also sell advertising on the Website, which enables us to give you access to all the content on indy100.com for free. By making the advertisements more relevant to your viewing preferences, lifestyle or your interests they should hopefully be more compelling and work better for the advertisers!

What do you get back?

When you sign up for indy100.com you opt in for some great benefits. From finding out what’s recommended reading each week with our range of email newsletters or entering competitions for the chance to come along to some of our events or to win great prizes.

We will keep you in touch with these benefits as they develop with the Website. We are hoping to add in a lot more that can give you more of a tailored experience.

You’re in control

Please rest assured we don’t sell your personal details on to anyone else. We will not bombard your inbox with emails you haven’t asked for. If you decide you’d like to change your preferences, you can alter these by managing your account page or through your social network provider. You can also contact us to ask us questions or easily find out answers to common queries in our policy pages in this section of our Website.

We want to make indy100.com a vibrant, engaging and essential experience for all our users. By being part of this you can help make this aim a reality. We are relying on your feedback and support. So we can deliver a website that truly becomes an important part of your daily life.

item.title: 25 Amazon Christmas gifts everyone will actually want this year
item.description: If you’re at a loss for gift-giving this year, fear not: We have done the legwork for you. No matter who you’re buying for in 2021, there’s something on Amazon they’ll love to open. We combed through every product category from makeup to pet goods to find the best gifting options in each. Keep readi...
item.dc:creator: Kelsey Chapman
item.content:encoded:
If you’re at a loss for gift-giving this year, fear not: We have done the legwork for you.

No matter who you’re buying for in 2021, there’s something on Amazon they’ll love to open. We combed through every product category from makeup to pet goods to find the best gifting options in each.

Keep reading to see which Amazon gifts will help you power through your Christmas shopping list–just make sure to check it twice, just like that guy in the big red suit does.

Le Creuset Enameled Cast Iron Signature Iron Handle Skillet, 10.25" (1-3/4 qt.), Deep Teal

Great friends deserve great food, so treat your chef friend to one of the best skillets on the market with this gorgeous Le Creuset cast iron model.

More than 1800 ratings give it an average of 4.5 out of 5 stars, with happy buyers cite even cooking, an easy-to-clean surface, and long-lasting lifetime of this pan as reasons to splurge.

In addition to the teal and satin black finish you see here, click through to see the other colors available and match the giftee’s kitchen appropriately.

Le Creuset
$189.95
Buy Now

Live Snake Plant

Plants have seen an intense resurgence in popularity the past few years which kicked into even higher gear during lockdown. Give your friend with the pale green thumb something they can’t kill with this snake plant, an attractive and hearty variety that is “a drought-tolerant perennial with sharp, dark green leaves year-round.”

Plants For Pets
$13.25
Buy Now

Vintage Retro 70s Sunglasses for Women and Men

They’re trendy, unisex, affordable, and will make any wearer look super cool. Give these to your fashion-forward friend or loved one who loves a well-placed accessory to boost their profile even more, or grab a pair for yourself to feel hip as we head into 2022.

Freckles Mark
$17.98
Buy Now

JIASUQI Cross Open Toe Fuzzy Fluffy House Slippers

Fuzzy slippers are an eternally loved and welcome gift, so buy confidently knowing this crowd-pleaser will go over well on Christmas morning. While we’re in love with this sleek black pair, the selection ranges from a bevy of solid colors to leopard and even tie-dye.

JIASUQI
$15.59
Buy Now

CMY Mixing Color Cube

Great for kids, desk workers, and fidgeters of all ages alike, the CMY cube is the perfect way to give someone something visually appealing and fun to play with that also relieves work or school fatigue by stimulating the brain in interesting ways. The ever-changing spectrum of colors adds interest and beauty to your workspace, and it can also help ease any on-the-clock anxiety you might feel.

YJWFHPU
$19.99
Buy Now

Simple Modern Classic Insulated Tumbler with Straw and Flip Lid - 28oz

If a product comes with neary 50,000 reviews and more than 90 percent of them are positive, you can bet it’s a solid choice for gifting nearly anyone.

A variety of colors are available so there’s no gender, style, or age barrier in your way, and the affordable price point makes them great for gift exchanges or budget-minded friends who might balk at something more extravagant.

Simple Modern
$24.99
Buy Now

Catan Board Game

When gifting one of the most popular board games in the world, it’s smart to make sure the receiver doesn’t already own it. If they don’t, though, you’re both in for a game night treat.

Catan is a game of strategy that relies on resource gathering to help you trade, build and settle the titular island. Anyone over 10 will grasp the rules easily, and there are plenty of expansion packs available to tack on adventures and challenges as you grow in experience.

Catan Studio
$35.20
Buy Now

Betty Crocker Countertop Pizza Maker, 1440-Watt Pizza Maker Machine for Home, BC-2958CR

Step up your favorite foodie’s at-home pizza game with this countertop maker from Betty Crocker that has a nonstick 12-inch surface, the perfect temperature settings, and a compact design that’s easy to store.

They won’t be confined to pizza alone, though, as it also makes delicious quesadillas, nachos, quiches, giant cookies, pancakes, and plenty of other fun treats, all without ever touching the oven.

Betty Crocker
Buy Now

Fossil Men's Machine Stainless Steel Quartz Chronograph Watch

The classic design and oversized face of this Fossil watch give it a timelessly sophisticated look, and Fossil technology means it will run forever and even survive bathing, swimming or snorkeling, and shallow diving. Wrap it up for a stylish and adventurous guy in your life with the certainty that he’ll love it.

Fossil
$84.50
Buy Now

Retro Bluetooth Speaker with Radio

Portable Bluetooth speakers make a fantastic gift for any music lover on the go, and this one is especially appealing for those who like a fashionably retro look and feel. One top review notes:

“You will like this if you want a Bluetooth speaker that doesn’t look like anyone else’s... The manufacturer nailed it with the vintage look and feel, and the little delightful touches, like the lighted dial and the knobs. Its more modern features include the subtle audible tone between setting clicks, and the LED indicators, which do not take away from the style from the rest of the unit.”

Yogyro
$59.99
Buy Now

Beautiful Boards: 50 Amazing Snack Boards for Any Occasion

Charcuterie’s popularity continues to reign supreme among those who love to entertain, so gift the person in your life like that with a book chock full of inspiration so they never come up short when it’s time to feed the party.

Maegan Brown
$15.67
Buy Now

Charcuterie Board Set

If you like the book we suggested above, make sure to throw in a board like this one to really treat your most charcuterie-loving friend. It has all the tools needed to serve a scrumptious spread at any party!

Home Euphoria
$46.99
Buy Now

SOCOSY Royal Embossed Crystal Glass Candy Box with Lid Footed Jewelry Box

Moms, grandmas, wives, and anyone else who loves a bit of whimsy will love this stunning multi-use footed glass box that can hold anything from sugar to jewelry. The rainbow colors reflect light beautifully, but there are also clear and amber options for those who prefer a more muted color palette in their home.

SOCOSY
$15.99
Buy Now

Dave Grohl’s ‘The Storyteller: Tales of Life and Music'

Music fans knows Dave Grohl is everywhere. From his youthful beginnings in hardcore bands to selling out the biggest venues in the world with Nirvana, the Foo Fighters, and more, the famed front man and multi-instrumentalist knows music inside and out.

Grohl finally decided put his story to paper with this best-selling memoir, The Storyteller: Tales of Life and Music, written the only way he knows how: in his own words. Buy this tome for the rock n’ roller in your life who loves wild tales from backstage, the studio, and beyond.

Dave Grohl
$18.72
Buy Now

LEATHERMAN, Wave Plus Multitool with Premium Replaceable Wire Cutters, Spring-Action Scissors and Nylon Sheath, Built in the USA, Black

A Leatherman tool is endlessly useful around the house, which is why we suggest them in every gift guide possible around Father’s Day, Christmas, and all other gift-giving holidays. The Wave Plus packs a whopping 18 tools, including but not limited to:

–pliers

–wire cutters and wire strippers

–a bottle opener

–screwdrivers

–files

LEATHERMAN
$99.95
Buy Now

NEST Fragrances Amalfi Lemon & Mint Scented 3-Wick Candle

Make a simple gift like a candle feel special and personal when you indulge your receiver in a luxurious brand like NEST and their delectable Amalfi Lemon & Mint scented 3-wick. It’s richly scented, vegan and cruelty-free, and it provides 75 to 100 hours of burn time that can elevate an atmosphere for months to come.

NEST
$19.99
Buy Now

Super Spirograph Design Set

If you’re shopping for a kid (or kid at heart) with even a lick of creativity in their brains, they’ll go nuts for this classic toy that lets you create intricate geometric patterns in any configuration imaginable. This 50th anniversary set, though a few years old now, is even better than the OG thanks to double the gears, including a commemorative gold gear.

Kahootz
$30.56
Buy Now

Burt’s Bees Timeless Minis Kit

Foot cream, body lotion, and beeswax lip balm–oh my! Give your favorite skincare aficionado the gift of abundance with this six piece kit of all Burt’s Bees cult classics. And check our favorite beauty deals for Black Friday while you’re at it!

Burt’s Bees
$18.80
Buy Now

New York Puzzle Company - New Yorker Home for The Holidays - 500 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle

With the overabundance of time we spend online these days, any excuse to unplug and focus on something tangible in front of our eyes is welcome. Give someone you care about that same sort of break with this gorgeous New Yorker puzzle featuring a cozy Christmas scene that will bring joy to those who assemble it for years to come.

New York Puzzle Company
$22.00
Buy Now

The Art of Shaving Pre Shave Beard Oil

This unscented beard oil is great for prepping the skin pre-shave, helping to prevents unsightly bumps and burns on the face. Free from alcohol and synthetic dyes, even the most sensitive-skinned shavers will love slathering this on to protect their precious visage.

The Art of Shaving
$25.00
Buy Now

Crosley CR6233D-RE Dansette Bermuda Portable Turntable with Aux-in and Bluetooth, Red

This is a fantastic beginner turntable for someone just getting into vinyl, or someone who wants an extra player for their home or office. It plays 33 1/3 and 45 RPM records, has adjustable pitch control, and is easy as pie to transport. Plus when you buy now, you’ll save $60!

Crosley
$189.01
Buy Now

Tulip One-Step Tie-Dye Kit 15-Color Party Kit, Standard, Rainbow

Tie-dye is popular once more, so give someone the gift of creating their own trendy clothes and accessories with this fun, under-$20 kit. Kids and teens will be especially appreciative.

Tulip
$19.51
Buy Now

Potaroma Electric Flopping Fish 10.5"

Cat owners know one of the great joys of life is watching your fluffy friend go wild over a new toy, and this is one of the most beloved out there. The goofy fish flops about wildly, instantly driving any cat to do the same with excitement.

Potaroma
$14.99
Buy Now

Leather Bound Journal

An attractive leather-bound journal is great for all sorts of reasons: inspiring one to write, jotting down travel or work notes, scribbling the ancient spells of your family down to create a sacred grimoire...the list goes on forever. This one is made particularly beautiful by its intricate leather detailing and lapis lazuli stone, as well as eco-friendly cotton-made paper inside.

Rustic Town
$19.99
Buy Now

Amazon Essentials Men's Long-Sleeve 100% Cotton Fisherman Cable Crewneck Sweater

The gift of a cozy winter sweater never fails to please. This classic Fisherman version will never go out of style, and it comes in a variety of colors (and a striped option!) so you can choose the best option to fit nicely in any recipient’s wardrobe.

Amazon Essentials
$32.80
Buy Now

item.title: 12 best toys to gift every kid in your life this Christmas
item.description: Kids are the easiest folks to cross off your Christmas list by far. Simply buy them something funny, squeaky, cute, or nerdy, and they’ll love you for the rest of the family dinner. If you still find it a bit difficult to find just the right toy, though, try browsing our list to see suggestions for ...
item.dc:creator: Kelsey Chapman
item.content:encoded:
Kids are the easiest folks to cross off your Christmas list by far. Simply buy them something funny, squeaky, cute, or nerdy, and they’ll love you for the rest of the family dinner.

If you still find it a bit difficult to find just the right toy, though, try browsing our list to see suggestions for what to gift every growing child in your family and friend circle. Whether it’s an under-$10 plush for your neighbor’s third grader or a makeup starter kit for the pre-teen gal in your life, you’re sure to find something here that will satisfy your holiday gifting needs.

Star Wars Grogu Plush Toy, 11-in “The Child” from The Mandalorian

Best for: Your Star Wars-obsessed little cousin

The Mandalorian has been over for almost a year, but that doesn’t mean Grogu has escaped the hearts of the masses! Gift this to a kid who can’t get enough of this cute, goofy little character.

Mattel
$17.97
Buy Now

LED luminous color-changing mushroom toy

Best for: Your preteen niece who wants to upgrade her room decor

You might still be the cool aunt or uncle, but not for long! Extend those precious pre-puberty years of childhood sweetness by gifting your niece these jaunty fungi that act as a nightlight but are still cool enough for big kids.

Vatenic
$17.99
Buy Now

Plush Stuffed Kitty

Best for: The neighbor kid who always asks about your cat

Sure, they can be annoying, but curious kids usually have the best intentions–even when it’s the sixth time this week they’ve stopped you to ask if they can come hang out with your beloved Fluffy sometime. Give them something cute to tide them over with this adorable plush.

The Apollo Box
$8.97
Buy Now

Best for: Your toddler with the growing brain

Several toys fit the above category, but these dinosaur egg-like stackables are weird, compact, and look easy to throw in a toy box when they’re not being tossed about by your little one.

Fat Brain Toy Co.
Buy Now

Dreamland Kids Vanity Set with Mirror

Best for: Your favorite little glam gal in training

If you know a kid who is already obsessed with raiding their mom’s makeup stash, this is the gift that will get you all the brownie points you need for the next year. Just check the reviews for proof:

“Perfect for my princess who spends more time in front of the mirror doing her make-up then I do. This purchase was a huge success!”

If you want bonus brownie points, tack on a fun beginner’s makeup kit.

$139.99
Buy Now

Hot Wheels Stunt Garage

Best for: Your nephew with the toy car collection

Hot Wheels have been plenty of kids’ favorite toys for a long, long time, and they’re still popular as ever. Give your favorite little car lover this stunt garage for Christmas to keep them busy through the new year.

Hot Wheels
$19.99
Buy Now

Vintage Phone

Best for: Your friend’s baby who just began jibber-jabbering

They don’t have to be able to say “mama” just yet to have a good time with this toy classic. Plus it will likely be the only time in the baby’s life when they’ll see an old rotary like this!

Le Toy Van
$24.95
Buy Now

Hand Knit Organic Stuffed Dog - Dash

Best for: Your socially and environmentally conscious friend’s new baby

It’s a little pricey, but it’s made from organic materials, fair trade, and will last them a lifetime. Plus, what kid doesn’t love a puppy?!

Our Green House
$59.00
Buy Now

HEXBUG JUNKBOTS Small Factory Habitat Sector 44 Research Lab

Best for: A kid who loves a surprise and a challenge

This kit comes with more than 200 pieces to discover, explore, build with, and ultimately create a unique and fun experience for any kid with a curious mind and hands to keep busy. They’ll be able to add to this setup, too, thanks to Hexbug’s vast line of tech toys and accessories made to help little minds grow.

HEXBUG JUNKBOTS
$29.99
Buy Now

12 V BMW 507 Licensed Electric Kids Ride On Retro Car

Best for: The little one you really want to spoil

Every kid looks cooler than cool in this incredible BMW electric car, so pick their favorite color (black and white are also available) and get ready to be the favorite parent/aunt/uncle/whatever you are to them for life–or at least until next Christmas.

BMW
$259.00
Buy Now

T'Challa Star-Lord Cosbaby Bobble-Head by Hot Toys – Marvel What If...?

Best for: Your Marvel-loving preteen godchild

If they’re out of that stage where any and all toys are good, get them something a little more grown up and special with this T’Challa Star-Lord collectible bobble-head. Just be forewarned: This is a pre-order so Christmas delivery isn’t guaranteed, but the wait will be worth it and give them something to look forward to post-holiday.

Disney
$24.99
Buy Now

Smithsonian Plasma Ball

Best for: Your favorite nerdy tween

Encourage their love of science and fun experiments with this incredible plasma ball. The lights respond to touch and sound, so they’ll stay entertained figuring out ways to make the squiggly lines dance for hours.

Smithsonian
$24.99
Buy Now

item.title: Best TV Black Friday deals 2021: Top offers from Best Buy, Walmart, and Amazon
item.description: Black Friday and deals on televisions are the peanut butter and jelly of high holiday shopping season. Years past have seen viral videos of people physically fighting over limited quantities, but thankfully online deals from top retailers have made those chaotic scenes feel obsolete. Below, we’ve ch...
item.dc:creator: Kelsey Chapman
item.content:encoded:
Black Friday and deals on televisions are the peanut butter and jelly of high holiday shopping season. Years past have seen viral videos of people physically fighting over limited quantities, but thankfully online deals from top retailers have made those chaotic scenes feel obsolete.

Below, we’ve chosen some of our favorite pre-Black Friday deals and TVs that promise to drop their prices come November 26th so you can get a head start on planning your big splurge. Check back on Black Friday to see what else we find!

SAMSUNG 60" Class 4K Crystal UHD (2160p) LED Smart TV with HDR UN60TU7000

While under $550 is already a great price on this TV, check back on Black Friday to see how much more you can save thanks to Walmart’s little yellow banner that promotes this as a sale item for the big day. Some high points to look at:

–Crystal Processor 4k

–looks great from any viewing angle

–high dynamic range makes colors and visual details pop

–only one remote necessary

SAMSUNG
$548.00
Buy Now

Sceptre 50" Class 4K UHD LED TV U515CV-U

For something a bit smaller and more affordable, try this Sceptre model television that’s already marked down from $328 to $248 ahead of the 26th. Some key notes:

–slim bezel-brush pattern design that adds a unique look and protection from scratching, but is also pleasing to touch

–LED display that delivers rich colors

–parental controls

Sceptre
$248.00
Buy Now

Hisense - 70" Class A6G Series LED 4K UHD Smart Android TV

This TV is exclusive to Best Buy and they’re already on top of showing customers the best deals of the season–read more about their policy of promising to refund the difference in our Black Friday primer. You’ll save $300 when you buy now (one of their biggest price cuts so far), so bookmark this option if you’re looking for:

–4K Ultra HD

–Dolby Vision™ HDR and HDR10 that gives more detail, even in shadows

–auto low latency mode for gaming

–voice remote

Hisense
$549.99
Buy Now

Sony - 65" Class BRAVIA XR X90J Series LED 4K UHD Smart Google TV

This is the lowest price on this model you’ll find anywhere this year, and here’s what it offers:

–4K (2160p) for four times the pixels of Full HD

–large 65 inch screen, perfect for living rooms or large bedroms

–LED display for high contrast and superior brightness

–DTS digital surround sound for pristine audio quality

Sony
$1199.99
Buy Now

Amazon Fire TV 50” 4-Series 4K UHD smart TV

The number one seller in Amazon’s LED & LCD TVs section is on sale for Black Friday. Here’s what to expect with this machine:

–4K Ultra HD, HDR 10, and HLG for a clearer, more vibrant picture with brighter colors compared to 1080p Full HD

–stream over 1 million movies and TV episodes

–watch live and free TV, play video games, and stream music

–Fire TV Alexa voice remote

Amazon
$329.99
Buy Now

item.title: Best beauty deals for Black Friday 2021: Top offers on skincare, makeup, and more
item.description: Beauty retailers are still holding out on revealing their biggest savings to expect on Black Friday, but we did some research to help you hone in on what you really want to splurge on this season. Here’s what we know so far: Sephora No preview deals have been made available, but Sephora currently h...
item.dc:creator: Kelsey Chapman
item.content:encoded:
Beauty retailers are still holding out on revealing their biggest savings to expect on Black Friday, but we did some research to help you hone in on what you really want to splurge on this season. Here’s what we know so far:

Sephora

No preview deals have been made available, but Sephora currently has an up to 20% off sale in store and online using the code YAYHOLIDAY until November 15th for Beauty Insiders, VIB, and Rouge members–sign up is free and you’ll receive year-round access to sales, specials, gifts, and more. Shoppers looking for the perfect presents will find the under-$20 holiday gift section especially helpful (easy to find via the front page), and Sephora Collection products are currently 30% off.

Ulta

Like Sephora, Ulta has chosen to take the route of secrecy while also providing a great way to stay up-to-the-minute when you sign up for their mailing list. They’re offering free shipping on all orders over $35, plus they’ve already dropped their holiday gift sets so you can start saving right away. Keep reading to see one of our top picks from the 2021 seasonal offerings below.

Neal Yard Remedies

This UK-based apothecary has everthing you need to build a natural, organic health and beauty collection, and their new US site is piling up Black Friday deals so those of us on this side of the pond can enjoy, too! Some discounts you can expect (and a handful already live) include:

–Up to 40% off skincare, bath, and body lines

–Up to 20% off home fragrance

– 15% off Frankincense Intense Lift Cream

– 20% off Calming Room Spray

– 40% off Bee Lovely Body Butter

Plus from November 25th to 30th, save an extra 10% off when you buy 4 or more products. Another bonus? For every product purchased over Black Friday weekend, they’ll protect a square meter of rainforest so you can buy with a clear conscience.

Dermstore

Black Friday deals are coming at Dermstore, but you’ll need to sign up for their mailing list to receive the full scoop to come. From November 20th to 29th, you’ll save up to 30% off favorite brands like Caudalie, Elizabeth Arden, Kate Somerville, and more, and you can get a jump start by checking out what’s hot in their Holiday Shop.

Olay

The classic skincare brand is already ramping up the holiday deals with discounts on exclusive gift sets like the Thirty, Flirty, and Smoothing bundle that features Niacinamide and Retinol-containing products to help you get the most youthful face possible. Look for yourself to see what else is up for grabs while there’s a site wide 25% off sale.

Glossier

Last year saw Glossier offering 25% of their coveted beauty must-haves, but we’re still waiting to see exactly what they’ll offer when the day after Thanksgiving rolls around this year. Until then, check out their limited edition holiday kits to see what kind of bundles will help you save big when it’s time to re-up on your favorite shades of Cloud Paint and Boy Brow.

Below we’ve listed a handful of our favorite current deals, and make sure to check back as we update this article and more to bring you the most up-to-date information concerning Black Friday sales.

Bumble and bumble The Curl-Loving Collection

Curly girls will rejoice over the steep discount on this set. The products you’ll receive in this bundle for nearly half off are the 3-in-1 BB Curl conditioner, moisturizing shampoo, defining cream, and reactivator, which brings droopy spirals back to life.

Bumble and bumble
$55.00
Buy Now

Holiday Fragrance Festival

Perfume is a classic gifting choice, so why not let the receiver experience a huge variety of fragrances with this “festival” box that includes scents from Juicy Couture, Givenchy, Prada, Valentino, Ariana Grande, Versace, and more for under $30.

Beauty Finds by Ulta
$29.50
Buy Now

Bee Lovely Hand Cream 50ml

This one transcends skin type, glamour level, gender, and more because everyone loves the gift of soft hands. Save a third when you buy now.

Neal’s Yard Remedies
$13.65
Buy Now

Sunday Riley Wake Up With Me: Complete Morning Skincare Routine 6 piece

Give the gift of not having to search for the perfect products when you snag this complete routine from popular skincare brand Sunday Riley and save $70 off retail.

Sunday Riley
$95.00
Buy Now

The Makeup Set

Stock up on three Glossier favorites and save $10 doing so with this special kit.

Glossier
$40.00
Buy Now

item.title: Best Buy’s Top Black Friday deals 2021: Top offers on TVs, computers, and more
item.description: We’ve discussed the deal with Best Buy’s early Black Friday sales and money-back promise in our primer for November 26th, but we wanted to continue showing off our favorite sale items that are great to pick up for yourself, your family, or anyone else on your holiday shopping list this year. Keep re...
item.dc:creator: Kelsey Chapman
item.content:encoded:
We’ve discussed the deal with Best Buy’s early Black Friday sales and money-back promise in our primer for November 26th, but we wanted to continue showing off our favorite sale items that are great to pick up for yourself, your family, or anyone else on your holiday shopping list this year.

Keep reading to see amazing deals already on sale at Best Buy, and continue browsing to see what discounted products fit nicely into your budget this year.

You can trust our independent reviews. We may earn a commission from some of the retailers, but we never allow this to influence selections, which are formed from real-world testing, expert advice and our own research. This revenue helps to fund journalism across The Independent.

Lenovo - Chromebook 3 11" Chromebook - AMD A6 - 4GB Memory - 32GB eMMC Flash Memory - Onyx Black

This is an amazing starter or replacement computer for anyone in your life who’s currently working with a lackluster machine. As one reviewer wrote:

“This was a Christmas present for my 21 year old daughter whose prior computer had had it The Chromebook OS works perfectly for her needs and maximizes the available 4gb memory for everyday use - media, a little education, communication, and more. It is very good overall. Lenovo is a quality brand with IBM lineage. A great reasonable laptop.”

Lenovo
Buy Now

Samsung - 75" Class 7 Series LED 4K UHD Smart Tizen TV

Go big or go home, or maybe it’s go big for your home? Either way, we support all decisions to introduce your family to this gigantic 75-inch television with crystal-clear 4K resolution, an LED display with superior brightness and color contrast, and lifelike images that pull you into an immersive experience.

Save $250 when you buy now during the Black Friday event.

Samsung
$849.99
Buy Now

Keurig - Limited Edition Jonathan Adler K-Mini Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker - White

We’re always happy to see a fun, cheap coffee maker around here, and this limited edition Jonathan Adler pod maker is as stylish as they come. Buy now for yourself or a loved one who needs a caffeine boost and you’ll save half off the original price.

Keurig
$49.99
Buy Now

SANUS Advanced Tilt 4D TV Wall Mount for TVs 42"-90" - Black

Practical gifts aren’t always the ones that spring to mind, but tack this wall mount onto the gift of a television for bonus points this Christmas. You’ll save $80.

SANUS
$89.99
Buy Now

AeroGarden - Harvest - Indoor Garden - Easy Setup - 6 Gourmet Herb pods included - Black

The AeroGarden makes it a cinch to grow your own herbs and veggies indoors, making this the ideal gift for an apartment dweller with a green thumb who can’t access their own outdoor space. Buy now and you can use the $60 you save to throw in an assortment of seeds or maybe even a salad spinner.

AeroGarden
$89.99
Buy Now

Walker Edison - Traditional Two Glass Door Fireplace TV Stand for Most TVs up to 65" - Black

In keeping with the “TVs and TV accessories” theme we have going, check out this cool stand that holds your television while providing the warm atmosphere of a fireplace right below.

Walker Edison
$349.99
Buy Now

ProForm - Pro 2000 Treadmill - Black

Torch off those holiday calories and enjoy 30 days of the iFit program when you buy this quality in-home treadmill for a third off the original price this season. It comes with all the bells and whistles of a gym model plus a 300 pound weight limit, so it’s a great way to get a jump start on your New Year’s fitness goals.

ProForm
$999.99
Buy Now

item.title: Best Walmart Black Friday deals 2021: Top offers on toys, Dysons, laptops, and more
item.description: Black Friday is coming up soon on November 26th, but most retailers have gotten ahead of the game by putting out early deals so you won’t be stuck losing out on post-Thanksgiving sales. Below are a few primer items already marked down to their lowest prices of the season that you can buy now and get...
item.dc:creator: Kelsey Chapman
item.content:encoded:
Black Friday is coming up soon on November 26th, but most retailers have gotten ahead of the game by putting out early deals so you won’t be stuck losing out on post-Thanksgiving sales.

Below are a few primer items already marked down to their lowest prices of the season that you can buy now and get wrapped for gifting early. Toys, laptops, vacuums, you name it–this is the best time of the year to buy, and we’ll be on the lookout so you don’t have to miss a markdown while spending time with your family.

Check back as we update this piece periodically until Black Friday, and make sure to check out our highlights from other stores (like Target) and shopping categories (like our favorite gifts for women this year) as well.

Dyson V10 Allergy Cordfree Vacuum Cleaner | Blue | New

Dyson is one of the top selling vacuum brands in the world, and this 14 cyclone, allergy reducing, cordless, handy model is a steal at $379.99 with Black Friday pricing.

Dyson
Buy Now

Thyme & Table Wood Board & Silicone Baking Set, 20-Pieces

This is the perfect starter pack for anyone just moving out on their own who needs a full kitchen setup but doesn’t have a huge budget. You get 20 pieces including an Acacia wood cutting board, rolling pin, silicone spatula, and three gold cheese knives so you can whip up something fun in no time flat.

This deal’s still in preview mode only, so make sure to bookmark it and come back when the savings really kick in. Make sure you’re a Walmart+ member for early access!

Thyme & Table
$30.00
Buy Now

HP Laptop

At less than three pounds and 16.9mm thin, this compact laptop is great for folks on the go who don’t want to be bogged down by a heavy computer. It comes with everything you need to work, plan, play, or study, and a lift-hinge keyboard protects your wrists with more comfortable typing.

You don’t have to wait for this deal, either, as Walmart has already marked this HP down by $130.

HP
Buy Now

Mainstays 8-Opening Barn Door 4 x 6 and 5 x 7 Picture Frame and Wall Picture Frame 19.5” H x 27” W, Black

If you want a fantastic Christmas gift idea for under $20, print off a few meaningful photos that your parents, siblings, or best friends will love, then stick them in a simple collage frame like this for an instant thoughtful moment. Keep an eye out as this one may drop in price even further as we approach November 26th.

Mainstays
$8.00
Buy Now

LEGO Classic Bricks and Animals 11011 Building Set (1,500 Pieces)

1,500 LEGOs is a lot of LEGOs. Buy this incredible set for a kid you want to keep busy all winter and you’ll still spend less than $30 while stimulating the parts of their brain that use spatial reasoning to interpret the world around them.

LEGO
$29.00
Buy Now

item.title: 10 best Christmas candles to light up your 2021 holiday season
item.description: It’s time to make your home feel cozy for Christmas, and no truly spirited scene is set without the warmth and comforting scent of a seasonal candle. We picked 10 of our favorites up for grabs this year that feature both classic and less traditional scent profiles, beautiful packaging, and great bur...
item.dc:creator: Kelsey Chapman
item.content:encoded:
It’s time to make your home feel cozy for Christmas, and no truly spirited scene is set without the warmth and comforting scent of a seasonal candle.

We picked 10 of our favorites up for grabs this year that feature both classic and less traditional scent profiles, beautiful packaging, and great burn times for creating maximum cheer around the holidays. Keep reading to see which best suits your fragrance palate and will beautify your home this December.

Balsam & Cedar Demi Tin Candle

If a fresh tree just won’t cut it in your home, try this balsam & cedar scented candle that offers 20 hours of burn time for just $12. Stock up and keep your home smelling fresh as pine all winter long.

Illume
$12.00
Buy Now

Cedar & Suede Soy Candle

Made with natural soy wax and cotton wicks, these candles from Public Goods are not Christmas-specific but bring about the kind of ambience and comfort you need to enjoy a cozy pre-holiday evening.

Notes of sandalwood, jasmine, Turkish rose, amber, and leather are a perfect blend for anyone who doesn’t want an overly sweet smelling holiday candle, and the wooden lids make this affordable option completely plastic-free.

Public Goods
$14.00
Buy Now

Holiday Candle Tin

If the adorable and reusable tin wasn’t enough to sell you on this candle, just wait until you hear the scent profile options: milk and cookies, mulled wine, and hot buttered rum are all waiting on your to order them and light up any room you burn them in with the tastiest aromas of the season.

Anthropologie
$22.00
Buy Now

The Nutcracker Candle

Cinnamon, clove, pecan, sandalwood, vanilla, musk, and wintermint in one candle: that’s the treasure trove awaiting you with this bold, minimalist design.

Homesick
$28.90
Buy Now

DS & Durga Portable Christmas Tree

With a name like this, what more needs to be said? There’s also the amazing modern packaging that takes the classic red Christmas color scheme and turns it on its head with abstract art. It’s a bit pricey, but you won’t regret investing in this limited edition candle.

DS & Durga
$65.00
Buy Now

Night Before Christmas

Inspired by “plum puddings, sweet treats and festive fruit,” this luxury candle brings all the yummy goodness of a Christmas Eve feast directly to your home with the flick of a match. The stunning package helps this candle double as sophisticated decor.

Glasshouse
$55.00
Buy Now

Lidded Glass Jar Candle Christmas Cheer - Opalhouse™

With 50 hours of burn time for just $5, this candle is an unbeatable deal. It’s not just cheap, though, as it packs a sweet triple punch with notes of clove, vanilla and orange ready to waft through your home for a relaxing Christmas season.

Opalhouse
$5.00
Buy Now

Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler

Everyone knows Yankee Candle is one of the world’s best candle makers, but did you know you can get 75 to 110 hours of burn time with this large two wick Christmas candle? And for under $20? It’s the perfect way to keep a flame going from now ‘til the ball drops on New Year’s Eve.

Yankee Candle
$18.88
Buy Now

Holiday Candle - Christmas Spirit

Folks who like their holidays a little tipsy will simply love this fun, boozy Christmas Spirit candle that calls to mind shots of apple pie moonshine and tipples of bourbon–minus the hangover.

Whiskey River Soap Company
$12.95
Buy Now

DW Home Spiced Apple Scented Candle

DW candles are among the best when you want scent to fill the whole house with delicious seasonal scents, and their Spiced Apple is one of the best. Light this up to enhance the atmosphere while you bake or watch your favorite seasonal movies.

DW Home
$12.99
Buy Now

item.content:encoded:
Black Friday officially happens on November 26th this year, but plenty of retailers like Target have already begun releasing deals on everything from electronics to toys to furniture and more.

Our job is to keep track of these deals and report on the ones we think you’ll love best, so below you’ll find the top deals on customer favorites that are already happening on Target.com.

Little Tikes Junior Toddler Starter 36 Inch Indoor/Outdoor Starter Play Slide with Steps and Easy Fold-up Storage, Green

It might not be the perfect season for outdoor play where you live, but this slide can easily be setup in a living room for year-round fun and excitement. Save $31 when you buy now for the rambunctious tot in your life.

Little Tikes
$69.99
Buy Now

Dash Mini Waffle Maker

It’s the perfect gift or stocking stuffer for anyone who likes a touch of sweet with their breakfast, and at just $10, you can stock up!

Dash
$10.00

Shark Rocket Ultra-Light Corded Stick Vacuum - HV301

Clean carpets and bare floors easily with this popular Shark ultra-light stick vacuum. It has swivel steering, converts easily into a hand vacuum, comes with specialized tools for a wide range of cleaning capabilities, and best of all: You save $30 when you buy during Target’s holiday sale.

Shark
$169.99
Buy Now

Apple AirPods Pro

Apple AirPods will undoubtedly be a big ticket item yet again this year, so save $50 when you buy while they’re on sale now through Saturday, November 5th for just $199.99–we’ll keep you updated if they dip any further.

$199.99
Buy Now

Mid Century Modern Wood Nightstand - Saracina Home

$103.99

item.title: 10 best beauty advent calendars to buy makeup lovers this year
item.description: For the people who love it, getting new makeup is always a blast. You get to flex your creative skills and look more beautiful at once–what’s not to love? However, the beauty industry is rarely a cheap one. Even budget brands can cost a pretty penny! That’s one thing that makes beauty advent calenda...
item.dc:creator: Kelsey Chapman
item.content:encoded:
For the people who love it, getting new makeup is always a blast. You get to flex your creative skills and look more beautiful at once–what’s not to love?

However, the beauty industry is rarely a cheap one. Even budget brands can cost a pretty penny! That’s one thing that makes beauty advent calendars so appealing: They’re festive, economical, encourage you to try new things, and they make the perfect gift for anyone in your life who loves a full face of makeup.

We perused the 2021 calendar offerings looking for the best options out there that will keep you stocked in essentials for the whole season and introduce you to some new faves. Keep reading to see which 10 beauty advent calendars are our top picks for Christmas 2021.

L'Occitane Holiday Advent Calendar

A holiday classic returns with the L’Occitane advent calendar and all its moisture-renewing favorites inside. You’ll get 24 sample size products including the Shea Intensive Hand Cream, Aqua Réotier Ultra-Thirst Quenching Moisturizer, and Verbena Body Lotion that will make anyone with dry skin shout “hallelujah” this Christmas.

The calendar’s retail value is estimated at $115.

L'Occitane
$79.00
Buy Now

Advent Calendar - Target Beauty Capsule - 12ct

For a more affordable calendar that lets its receiver play with 12 days of makeup from E.l.f, Real Techniques, NYX, Maybelline, and more, try this Beauty Capsule from Target for just $20.99.

Target
$20.99
Buy Now

25 Days Of Beauty Advent Calendar, Created for Macy's

Macy’s yearly advent calendar is always chock full of beauty standbys, and this year delivers such diverse goods as Caudalie Vinoperfect Radiance Serum, Lancôme Lash Idôle Mascara, Sunday Riley Luna Sleeping Night Oil, and 22 other luxury items for a steeply discounted price in their trial sizes.

The estimated value included is $292, plus you’ll get a $10 off coupon for your next Macy’s beauty purchase as a bonus!

Macy's
$99.00
Buy Now

NYX Gimme Super Stars! Holiday Advent Calendar

NYX is a cheap, reliable brand that not only follows the trends, they help create them. Gift yourself or your favorite beauty guru this 24-piece kit that includes full and travel sizes of favorites like Pore Filler primer and Butter Gloss to plump up your pout.

NYX
$60.00
Buy Now

ASOS Face + Body 24 Day Holiday Calendar Save 75%

One of the most coveted calendars of the year comes from ASOS and features 24 products (15 of which are full size!) plus a reusable tote and tie-scarf. Hair products, color products, skincare–you name it, it’s in here for a quarter of the suggested retail value. Buy now because these numbered and branded boxes are selling out quickly!

ASOS
Buy Now

Essence Advent Calendar

Two things we do here at Wishlist: Trust Ulta and love a surprise. Indulge both by checking out this mysterious Essence Advent Calendar that promises 24 beauty surprises with not a drop more info about them available. Think of it as a beauty blind box.

Ulta
$45.00
Buy Now

Snow One Loves You More 12 Day Advent Calendar

E.l.f.’s calendar is such a fantastic deal this year because it’s basically the equivalent of buying a full makeup starter kit, tools and all, for under $50. The lash curler, sponge, eye shadows, and blending brush are fantastic staples in any artist’s kit, so buy this for the fledgling glamour gal in your life.

E.l.f. Cosmetics
$45.00
Buy Now

OPI Holiday '21 Nail Lacquer Mini 25pc Advent Calendar

If someone you love is constantly shelling out hundreds for professional manicures and wants to save some dough, gift them this 25-piece nail polish calendar from the best lacquer makers in the game, OPI.

OPI
$69.95
Buy Now

Lush Advent Calendar

You can slap on all the powders and paints known to humankind, but we all know you’ll never look your best if you’re not getting the rest and relaxation you deserve. Seek it out with this overstuffed box from Lush featuring all the company’s best signature products meant to help you reach zen in your bathtub and beyond.

Lush
$299.95
Buy Now

Benefit Cosmetics Beauty Advent Calendar Set

Benefit’s hit products like Hoola Bronzer and Pore-fessional are almost universally loved for a reason, and the reason is they’re unbeatable. Jump on this deal to try a full range of their customer favorites and enjoying your holiday season with a perfectly made-up mug.

Benefit
$65.00
Buy Now

item.title: Jump start your Black Friday shopping with these amazing tech deals
