Stores are getting smarter, though, with many releasing special deals throughout the season to help you beat the rush for Christmas gifts. Below are some of our fav...
item.dc:creator: Kelsey Chapman
item.content:encoded:
Thanksgiving is fast approaching and with it comes big post-turkey savings at nearly every major and minor retailer across the country.

Stores are getting smarter, though, with many releasing special deals throughout the season to help you beat the rush for Christmas gifts. Below are some of our favorite current sale examples in the tech and electronics categories from our favorite Black Friday retail participants.

Keep scrolling to see what’s on the docket today to save you wads of cash when it comes to scoring big ticket items from Walmart, Amazon, Kohl’s, and more.

Apple AirPods Pro

Are your teenage children begging for AirPods this year? Have you lost your own and need a replacement pair? Snag them now and save $50 while Target has these popular earbuds on sale before the holidays.

Apple
$199.99
Buy Now

Hisense - 43" Class H55 Series LED Full HD Smart Android TV

We love showing you the best deals on televisions all season long, including this ultra-affordable 43” model from Hisense. Perfect for dens and bedrooms, this TV has Full HD (1080p), superior brightness, high color contrast, and it’s great for games and movies. Buy now while it’s at its lowest price in months at Best Buy.

Hisense
$229.99
Buy Now

Acer Chromebook Spin 311 CP311-3H-K3WL Convertible Laptop, MediaTek MT8183C Octa-Core Processor, 11.6" HD Touchscreen, 4GB LPDDR4X, 32GB eMMC

Create a notebook, stand-up display, tent or tablet-style device instantly with this all-in-one, handy Chromebook Spin from Acer. It weighs just 2.12 pounds and slips into any size bag, making it perfect for students or working folks on the go, and responsive performance and great graphics are perfect for daily tasks.

Buy now at Walmart to get the best price of the year so far–it’s regularly $299, but you’ll pay just $155 thanks to this Rollback deal.

Acer
$155.00
Buy Now

JBL Endurance Peak II - Waterproof True Wireless in-Ear Sport Headphones - Black

This isn’t the first time we’ve sung the praises of these amazing earbuds, and it probably won’t be the last. They’re sleek, have amazing noise-cancelling technology, and show off the full range of tones in whatever you have queued up, plus the carrying case helps them hold 30 hours of playtime before you have to recharge.

The best part? They’re half off right now. Buy for all the audiophiles you love!

JBL
$49.95
Buy Now

Blink Outdoor 2-cam Security Camera System

The Blink Outdoor Camera is a wire-free, battery-powered security camera with a long battery life (up to two years on a single set of AAs) that can monitor your home day or night in 1080p HD with infrared night vision. Other pros include motion sensors, live views delivered straight to your phone, and a free 30-day trial of the Blink subscription plan.

Buy from Kohl’s today to save $80 off the original price and give yourself an extra level of security at home.

Blink
$99.99
Buy Now

item.title: 20 best Christmas gifts for all the women in your life this year
item.description: Shopping for women can seem daunting. With millions of options out there fighting for your attention, we took the time to dig through some favorites and craft a guide guide that inspires you to buy the best possible gift for your wife, sister, mom, mother in law, and more this Christmas. Whether she...
item.dc:creator: Kelsey Chapman
item.content:encoded:
Shopping for women can seem daunting. With millions of options out there fighting for your attention, we took the time to dig through some favorites and craft a guide guide that inspires you to buy the best possible gift for your wife, sister, mom, mother in law, and more this Christmas.

Whether she’s a glamorous queen with an eye for glitzy detail or just trying to get a strong caffeine fix every morning, keep reading to see if the woman you’re shopping for shows up on this list. When you’re finished here, make sure to check out our guide for the best gifts for dads over here and get inspired to gift your partner something sexy, too.

Inna Organic Sensitive Skin Set

Best for: Your “organic-only” friend

Skincare buffs will love Inna Organic’s set specifically formulated for those with sensitivity, and this gift set is the perfect way to help her pamper herself.

Inside she’ll find one Botanical Trio Ultra-soothing Face Lotion, one Pure Moisturizing Body Lotion and four Botanical Trio Ultra-soothing Face Masks, all ready to be used during a relaxing at-home spa evening. Pair it with a new robe or slippers (more on those later) to really drive home the relaxation theme.

Inna Organic
$105.25
Buy Now

Gloria Slip Dress

Best for: The wife you want to make feel sexy

To give her a truly luxurious lingerie experience, try Maylyn & Co.’s new Gloria Slip Dress in the company’s signature vegan Persian Lotus Silk finished off with delicate floral embroidery. Sustainability is key for Maylyn & Co., so buy for the eco-conscious shopper in your life.

RELATED: See more from this boutique brand plus plenty of other fantastic lingerie stores here.

Maylyn & Co
$290.00
Buy Now

2021 HERITAGE Necklace with Pendant

Best for: Your vintage-obsessed wife

This stunning pendant is created from oxidized sterling silver and white mother of pearl in the tradition of Danish silversmith Georg Jensen’s original designs from the Art Nouveau period. It’s perfect for the casual jewelry wearer or serious collector who enjoy a vintage touch and timeless appeal, and each piece comes with the dated engraved on the back of the pendant to commemorate the passing of the years.

Georg Jensen
$295.00
Buy Now

Owl’s Brew ParTea

Best for: Your stressed-out mother in law who just cooked for 20 people

If she’s health-conscious but still likes to relax with an adult beverage sometimes, give her the gift of Owl’s Brew ParTea. The New York-brewed beverage is a fun take on the seltzer trend using a blend of organic tea and botanicals to achieve a tasty final product that’s either low gluten or gluten-free depending on flavor. It makes a perfect stocking stuffer to open on Christmas Eve once the stress of wrapping gifts is complete.

Owl's Brew
$10.99
Buy Now

Wyn Small Wallet With Paint Dab Floral Print

Best for: Your sister who flirts with cottagecore aesthetics

A Coach bag or accessory is always a sophisticated choice for gifting, and this wallet is the right size, price, and delicate print to please a wide range of receivers. The cream leather and dainty flowers will look great as she carries this into spring, and the card slots and folds offer plenty of organizational options.

Coach
$125.00
Buy Now

NAF! Stuff Protect & Moisturise Kit

Best for: Germaphobes and moms with young kids

Help her keep her purse stocked on essentials with hand care essentials with this adorable, portable kit that includes:

–50ml Light Hand Cream in Pink Grapefruit Scent

–50ml 62% alcohol Hand Sanitizer Spray

–50ml Hydrating Hand Care Mist

NAF! Stuff
$35.88
Buy Now

RENPHO Eye Massager with Heat & Bluetooth Music

Best for: The high-powered boss babe

If she’s stressed out by a job involving looking at a screen for too long each day, treat her to this eye massager that alleviates strain and can soothe headaches using kneading, trigger point, oscillating pressure, and rhythmic percussion massaging. It even has Bluetooth built in so she can play relaxing music to enhance the experience.

RENPHO
$69.99
Buy Now

Athena Necklace

Best for: The woman who has it all

Athena was the goddess of heroes, so show a strong lady in your life just what you think of her with this gorgeous golden medallion fit for a queen who is also a warrior.

Awe Inspired
$185.00
Buy Now

Aromatherapy Bath Bomb Gift Set, 9-pack

Best for: The Mom who needs a spa day

Skip the same tired shower gel and hand lotion gift set from the mall and give her an indulgent set of fancy bath bombs that encourage rest and relaxtion with essential oils and sea salt.

Zaaina
$49.99
Buy Now

Earthtones Magnifying Makeup / Shaving Mirror

Best for: Your most glamorous girlfriend

A hand mirror is much more reliable than using an iPhone camera to touch up lipstick, so treat the lady in your life to a fancy one with this Olivia Reigel magnifying mirror. She’ll feel that extra touch of glamour every time she reaches in her purse.

Olivia Reigel
$95.00
Buy Now

Glasshouse Fragrances Lost In Amalfi Hand Duo Gift Set

Best for: That brunch frenemy who never shuts up about traveling

Just kidding–we all love seeing those Instagram reels from the Italian coast! Give her a gift sure to spark memories with this Amalfi-inspired fragrance set that comes with matching hand wash and cream.

Glasshouse Fragrances
$50.00
Buy Now

Caboodles Rose Gold On The Go Girl

Best for: The elder millennnial who started wearing makeup when Great Lash was still cool

If you want to impress a lady who came of age in the late eighties or early nineties, try this reimagined, rose gold gilded, Ulta-exclusive Caboodle. It’s built with various storage compartments like the OG, and it looks great on any vanity or bathroom counter.

Caboodles
$20.99
Buy Now

Plus CBD Variety Pack

Best for: The anxious bestie who likes a natural way to relax

Plus has done the legwork for anyone interested in CBD by labeling and color-coding this variety pack with their respective modes: UPLIFT for energy, BALANCE for stabilizing your mood throughout the day, and SLEEP for a fantastic night’s rest. Delicious flavors include blueberry, grapefruit, and blackberry tea to coordinate with each edible’s purpose, making the experience even more enjoyable.

Plus
$100.00
Buy Now

Flour Water Salt Yeast

Best for: Your aunt who just got really into The Great British Bake Off

Baking enthusiasts of all skill levels will appreciate this sophisticated guide to creating bread at home. From “rustic boules to Neapolitan-style pizzas” and everything in between, this book has everything the most basic bread makers and kneading geniuses alike can use to make deliciously doughy treats.

Penguin Random House
$35.00
Buy Now

Airwrap™ Complete Styler Limited Edition Set

Best for: Your wife with the luscious locks

For the woman who loves showing off a shiny head of hair, gift the coveted Dyson Airwrap. It’s perfect for all hair types, increases shine, minimizes frizz and the effects of damage, and it comes with storage and travel cases for neatly carrying around attachments.

Dyson
$599.00
Buy Now

Miffy Light and Humidifier

Best for: Your friend who loves hydrated skin and cute stuff

Hydration is wildly important for overall health, so buy this adorable humidifier for the lady in your life who loves to stay moisturized and relaxed. You can even add essential oils to boost the sensory experience!

Miffy
$50.00
Buy Now

Nitro Cold Brew Coffee Maker

Best for: Moms who need caffeine (aka most of them)

Why should she have to stand in line every morning waiting for caffeine when she can get a jump on things at home? It’s easy to use, attractive, and a surefire “wow” face when she’s opening this gift.

Uncommon Goods
$200.00
Buy Now

Botanica Oculta Tarot 78 +2 Extra Cards Deck Antique Edition

Best for: The plant witch in your friend group

If she’s interested in the occult or esoteric or she simply can’t walk past a plant shop without stopping in, gift her a set of tarot cards that render those obsessions in beautiful detail across a 78-card spread that comes with two bonus cards.

HTF4 Tarot
$39.00
Buy Now

Hilma af Klint - Altarpice No. 1 Goup X

Best for: The art school dropout mom who still loves museums

Women have always gotten the short stick in the art world when held up to the standards of their male peers. Hilma af Klint, the likely mother of Western abstraction whose contribution to art has been brazenly under-appreciated, is a prime example of this double standard. Give your mom or partner a history lesson and stunning print of one of af Klint’s finest works when you buy this fantastic poster for her this Christmas.

Hilma af Klint
$64.00
Buy Now

Bibliophile Ceramic Vase: Collected Curiosities

Best for: The bookish gal pal whose library already overflows

She doesn’t need more books, but she does need this vase that pays homage to her favorite quiet pastime while holding a fresh bouquet. It even has a fantastic quote from Louisa May Alcott on the back that states:

“The power of finding beauty in the humblest things makes home happy and life lovely.”

Chronicle Books
$2.95
Buy Now

item.title: Black Friday is here early with Best Buy’s deals for today, October 27th
item.description: Ahead of Black Friday, Amazon has created a section for Epic Daily Deals. Here, you’ll find all their latest markdowns on everything from housewares to clothing to tech gadgets to toys, so we’ll be choosing our daily favorites and writing about them for you.Check our primer on what to expect from Am...
item.dc:creator: Kelsey Chapman
item.content:encoded:
Ahead of Black Friday, Amazon has created a section for Epic Daily Deals. Here, you’ll find all their latest markdowns on everything from housewares to clothing to tech gadgets to toys, so we’ll be choosing our daily favorites and writing about them for you.

Check our primer on what to expect from Amazon on Black Friday here, and keep reading to discover the best savings you can find in every category right now!

Toshiba 43LF421U21 43-inch Smart HD 1080p TV

This Toshiba television has 1080p resolution and a bevy of Smart home attributes, and for just under $240, you can’t beat a 43-inch screen. Save even more when you use your Amazon Visa and get $11.49 in cash back rewards.

Toshiba
$229.99
Buy Now

Melissa & Doug Slice and Bake Wooden Christmas Cookie Play Food Set

Inject a little early holiday spirit into your child’s playtime with this fun Christmas cookie set. They’ll receive 12 sliceable cookies and decorative toppings, an oven mitt, a wooden cookie sheet, a knife, and a spatula to help them develop fine motor skills while they have fun “baking” alongside you.

Melissa & Doug
$16.77
Buy Now

JBL Endurance Peak II - Waterproof True Wireless in-Ear Sport Headphones - Black

JBL make some of the clearest-sounding, most successful noise cancelling headphones we’ve ever tried, so get your hands on one of their best pairs for under $80 right now while they’re marked down. The pure bass sound will motivate you to move, and you get 30 hours of use out of just one charge!

JBL
$79.95
Buy Now

Tommy Hilfiger Club Comforter Set

Tommy Hilfiger’s classic American style is most famous via the designer’s chic sartorial options, but now you can bring the rich feel to your bedroom with this Club comforter set. Buy now while the sales are raging and you’ll save more than 50% off the original price.

Tommy Hilfiger
Buy Now

Invicta Men's 6981 Pro Diver Collection Chronograph Black Dial Black Dress Watch

It looks great, runs perfectly, and it’s suitable for recreational surfing, swimming, snorkeling, sailing and water sports–what’s not to love? It makes a perfect gift for Dad, but feel free to browse our other list for him, too, since you’re here.

Invicta
$64.00
Buy Now

item.title: Black Friday is here early with Best Buy’s deals for today, October 21st
item.description: Best Buy is offering up Black Friday prices already, and they’ve set up a fail-safe system to make sure you even get a refund for the difference if you catch them slipping! Now through November 26th, daily deals featured on the Best Buy website will see everything from air fryers to headphones heavi...
item.dc:creator: Kelsey Chapman
item.content:encoded:
Best Buy is offering up Black Friday prices already, and they’ve set up a fail-safe system to make sure you even get a refund for the difference if you catch them slipping!

Now through November 26th, daily deals featured on the Best Buy website will see everything from air fryers to headphones heavily discounted to get a head start on the holiday shopping season. To ensure you’re getting the best price possible, simply sign up for Best Buy Totaltech™ or a My Best Buy® membership and purchase an item labeled “Black Friday Prices Guaranteed.”

Whatever you pay that day is sure the be the lowest cost of the season, and if not, the store will automatically refund the difference. It’s impossible to beat, and you don’t have to stress about waking up at 4am after Thanksgiving just to find the good sales.

Keep checking Wishlist for daily updates about current and upcoming sales, including the highlights from Best Buy’s best offerings right now.

Samsung - Odyssey Gaming CRG5 Series 27" LED Curved FHD G-Sync Monitor - Dark Blue/Gray

Serious gamers will love this Samsung 27-inch RapidCurve monitor that promises to reduce eye strain and eliminate lag with its 240Hz refresh rate. Over a thousand reviews average out to a 4.7 out of 5 star rating, with several users noting the design, color quality, ease of setup, and reasonable price.

That price is slashed even further when you buy now through Saturday, as Best Buy has the monitor marked down to just $249 versus the usual $399.

Samsung
$249.99
Buy Now

ProForm - Carbon T10 - Blac

If you’re looking to stay in shape over the holidays, this might be the perfect splurge for your home gym.

This ProForm comes with a 10-inch Smart HD touchscreen, up to 10mph speed, 0 to 12% incline, and a 30-day iFIT membership to get you started on your fitness journey. The deck features a special cushioning technology to reduce joint stress and shock, and it features patented SpaceSaver design to leave a smaller footprint in your home.

Buy now and you’ll save $400.

ProForm
$799.99
Buy Now

Beats by Dr. Dre - Beats Studio³ Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones - Matte Black

Perfect for gifting the young music fan in your life who wants quality headphones that are stylish, too, this Beats by Dr. Dre has Pure Adaptive Noise Cancelling (Pure ANC) and real-time audio calibration to preserve clarity, range, and emotion. Save over 50% when you buy today.

RELATED: We asked music experts to suggest their favorite headphones.

Beats by Dr. Dre
$169.99
Buy Now

It’s compact, streamlined, and $99. If you’re looking for a basic laptop that’s sleek and portable but still allows for great productivity, this is the cheapest option you’ll find all season.

HP
$99.00
Buy Now

Mr. Coffee - 12-Cup Coffee Maker with Strong Brew Selector - Stainless Steel

We love a great cheap coffee maker around here, so snag this model by one of the best makers on the market to save big before Black Friday arrives.

Mr. Coffee
$29.99
Buy Now

item.title: 8 best pre-lit Christmas trees to brighten up your holiday decor
item.description: Buying Christmas lights for the tree year after year can be very annoying. Strands get tangled, bulbs burn out, and you never know if you’re going to pull out a totally dead string that should have been tossed out years ago. Get rid of all that hassle by investing in a quality pre-lit artificial tre...
item.dc:creator: Kelsey Chapman
item.content:encoded:
Buying Christmas lights for the tree year after year can be very annoying. Strands get tangled, bulbs burn out, and you never know if you’re going to pull out a totally dead string that should have been tossed out years ago.

Get rid of all that hassle by investing in a quality pre-lit artificial tree that provides a heavenly glow to your holiday decor in just a few quick steps.

We’ve chosen a handful of favorites on sale now, from the more traditional, realistic options to the out-there colors like pink or black, so keep reading to find the perfect tree that promises to brighten your home for the Christmas 2021 season.

The Northern Lights Christmas Trees

Watch as a dazzling light show in your own home as this fiber optic tree and its 23 pre-programmed display patterns dance along its branches to create the look of the Northern Lights. There’s even a timer so your tree is lit for eight hours at a time then off for the daytime!

It comes in various sizes (and corresponding price points), so click through to see which size best fits your home whether it be the tabletop option or a towering nine foot ceiling-scraper.

Hammacher Schlemmer
$349.95
Buy Now

Best Choice Products 6ft Pre-Lit Holiday Christmas Pine Tree w/ Snow Flocked Branches, 250 Warm White Lights

Add not only light but convincing and charming fake snow to your decor spread when you buy this six-foot tree from Best Choice Products at Walmart. Simple three-step assembly and pre-strung lights on hundreds of PVC branches maximize glow with minimal effort, leaving you ready to hang ornaments in no time flat.

Best Choice Products
$159.99
Buy Now

6ft Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree Alberta Spruce Clear Lights - Wondershop™

For a budget-friendly option, try this $60 tree from Target that comes with 250 lights and weighs just 10 pounds. Assembly and storage is a breeze with no tools needed, and the lights provide a constant warm glow.

Wondershop
$60.00
Buy Now

8 ft Giant-Sized LED Pre-Lit Bare Branch Tree with 700 Multi Color Lights

Take a less traditional route with this oversized bare-branch tree appropriate for indoor or outdoor use. It has over 700 multicolored lights included and a collapsable base for easy setup.

Home Accents Holiday
$218.00
Buy Now

National Christmas Tree 4' Lehigh Valley Pine Entrance Trees Set

Currently marked down when you use code FLASH at checkout, this pair of mid-height tree will look perfect flanking your entryway or fireplace this Christmas.

National Christmas Tree
$18.39
Buy Now

Dunhill Fir 7.5' White Artificial Christmas Tree with 750 Clear/White Lights

Quit dreaming of a white Christmas and make it your reality with this enormous 7.5 foot twinkling white tree featuring 750 clear lights and lush, full branches. It weighs around 47 pounds once all together, but three separate parts make it easy to move around and snap together quickly.

Mercury Row
$275.99
Buy Now

Black Artificial Christmas Halloween Tree with Purple LED Lights

Who says you need to stick to a traditional color palette when decorating the tree? Keep it dark and spooky from Halloween through New Year’s Day when you order this black tree illuminated in stunning purple LED lights.

Costway
$99.95
Buy Now

6ft Pre-lit Snow Flocked Pink Artificial Christmas Tree with Incandescent Warm White Lights, Pink

Speaking of non-traditional, there’s just something so sweet about a pastel pink tree, isn’t there? We’re in love with this romantic fir from Amazon that has a snow-dusted look and 250 lights to lend a warm feeling to your home. It also comes in more traditional color schemes should pink not quite fit your aesthetic.

Yaheetech
$99.99
Buy Now

item.title: Amazon’s best pre-Black Friday deals for today, October 19th
item.description: Now through Black Friday, Amazon is showing off their Epic Daily Deals to get you excited for the year’s biggest shopping day on November 26th. Until then, we’ll be choosing some of our favorites on sale right now so you can save big on holiday shopping.
item.dc:creator: Kelsey
item.content:encoded:
Now through Black Friday, Amazon is showing off their Epic Daily Deals to get you excited for the year’s biggest shopping day on November 26th. Until then, we’ll be choosing some of our favorites on sale right now so you can save big on holiday shopping.

Beyblade Burst Evolution Star Storm Battle Set Game (Amazon Exclusive)

Great for gifting the young gamer in your life, here’s what Beyblade has to say about this Amazon exclusive version:

“Season 2 of the animation, Beyblade Burst Evolution, takes the competition global as Valt evolves his skills on the path to Beyblade Mastery. Face off against an opponent with Beyblade Burst tops inspired by the animated series. Beyblade Burst tops (each sold separately) can ‘burst’ into pieces resulting in 2 points for the other player (burst rates vary). First blader to reach 3 points wins. Beyblade Burst tops’ components are interchangeable with most Beyblade Burst tops except Beyblade Burst Rip Fire tops. Collect, customize, compete -- over 15,000 combinations!”

Reviews are generally positive, with one mom stating, “My nine-year-old twin boys love it! It comes with two high-quality Beyblades. They love the arena with the dome on top because they stay in a little easier.”

Buy now and save 37% with this lightning deal before it’s fully claimed.

Beyblade
$21.99
Buy Now

Baby Alive Sweet Tears Baby

Baby Alive has been popular with little ones for decades, so get some Christmas shopping done now and treat your baby to one while she’s 50% off. In addition to the doll, you’ll receive a handful of accessories like a stethoscope, bottle, hairbrush, and more for more dynamic play.

Baby Alive
$24.99
Buy Now

Segway Ninebot E22 E45 Electric Kick Scooter, Upgraded Motor Power, 9-inch Dual Density Tires, Lightweight and Foldable

This scooter, from originators Segway, can reach speeds of 12.4 miles per hour and travel nearly 14 miles carrying a 220 pound load. It’s lightweight and folds easy for travel, and it weighs just 28 pounds so you can carry it onto a bus or subway.

Buy now and save $123 off the original price, with monthly payments of $85 available in case you’re not ready to throw down that much cash all at once. It makes a great gift for anyone in your life who needs a little help getting around, especially in urban or suburban areas, or for older kids who aren’t quite ready for a dirt bike or other motorized vehicle.

Segway
$429.99
Buy Now

Disney Princess Comics Adventure Discoveries Collection, Doll Set with 9 Figures, Bases, Display Castle and Case, Toy for Girls 3 and Up

If your child loves Disney characters, look no further than this Princess Comics Adventures set of nine figures, bases, and display castle for one of the most exciting gifts Santa can bring. Save 40% when you buy now.

Disney
$29.99
Buy Now

NERF DinoSquad Tricera-Blast Dart Blaster, Break-Open 3-Dart Loading, 12 Official Darts, Dart Storage, Triceratops Dinosaur Design

We don’t need to explain the appeal of a NERF dart blaster to you–the fun is in the name! Share it with your kids (or start your own grownup battle) and save 43% when you buy this dino-inspired model today.

NERF
$11.99
Buy Now

item.title: 10 best kids’ advent calendars to help little ones count down to Christmas 2021
item.description: December 1st is the unofficial kickoff to the countdown to Christmas. For revelers who like to soak up every bit of the season they can, that leaves 24 days of merriment, togetherness, and holiday spirit that can be enhanced by a small treat each day in the form of an advent calendar. We’ll be bring...
item.dc:creator: Kelsey Chapman
item.content:encoded:
December 1st is the unofficial kickoff to the countdown to Christmas. For revelers who like to soak up every bit of the season they can, that leaves 24 days of merriment, togetherness, and holiday spirit that can be enhanced by a small treat each day in the form of an advent calendar.

We’ll be bringing you our favorite advent calendars pertaining to beauty, liquor, sweet treats, and more throughout the season, but let’s start with something for the children first: toys.

Below you’ll find a smattering of the thousands of calendars made with a younger audience in mind, from the fun paper art of Lovepop’s offerings to the adventurous collection of Pokemon waiting to rest under your tree this season. Keep scrolling to see which will keep your children smiling throughout December this year.

Christmas Village Advent Calendar

Create your own Christmas village piece by piece with this cozy kit from KiwiCo. Starting December 1st, you’ll have a project a day in a conveniently marked envelope that comes with step-by-step instructions so it’s easy for builders of all learning levels to grasp. Carolers, trees, and even Santa’s sleigh will join together in the end for a heartwarming scene that puts the whole family in the holiday spirit.

KiwiCo
$49.95
Buy Now

Advent Calendar: Nativity

Lovepop is a perennial favorite of ours at Wishlist, which is why you’ll find two of their fantastic advent calendars here today. This nativity version follows in similar footsteps to the Pancake the Penguin’s Christmas Adventure we loved so much last year (which is still available fyi) by providing 25 individual pouches you open with your little ones each day leading up to Christmas to reveal a full scene that tells the story of Jesus’ birth.

Lovepop
$39.00
Buy Now

Play-doh® Advent Calendar

Play-doh might be designed to inject a healthy does of creativity into children’s play, but that doesn’t mean it isn’t fun for adults, too! Gather the whole family around for a cheery seasonal movie each evening during the countdown to Christmas and pluck open a door to discover goods like a snowflake stamper, a tree mold, and 22 other surprises for a December full of inventive play.

Play-doh
$10.00
Buy Now

Pokemon 24 Battle Figure Pack 2021 Holiday Advent Calendar

If your kid has to do as they’re told and “catch ‘em all,” you’re looking at the right calendar. It comes with 16 dynamically posed figures plus eight holiday accessories so your Pokemon can battle it out in seasonal fashion.

Pokemon
$34.99
Buy Now

PLAYMOBIL Advent Calendar - Christmas Toy Store

With its promise of a “Christmas Toy Store backdrop, four figures, Christmas tree, snowman, gift boxes, tricycle, skateboard, and tons of other toys and accessories,” Playmobil’s annual advent calendar continues to be a much-anticipated favorite every holiday season. Enjoying opening each piece with your kids until you’re finally ready to see the full toy store scene on Christmas Even, sure to inspire even more dreams of the merriment to come.

PLAYMOBIL
$24.99
Buy Now

Advent Calendar: Figg and Jammi's Christmas Wish Machine

For the more secular celebration, Lovepop offers Figg and Jammi’s Christmas Wish Machine. These precious characters lead you on a 25-day adventure that introduces twists, turns, and new friends each day until Figg and Jammi’s full invention is unveiled on Christmas morning! As with all Lovepop paper art, these are easy to pop back into their envelope for years use after year in what’s sure to become a sweet family tradition.

Lovepop
$39.00
Buy Now

FAO Schwarz Dinosaur Advent Calendar Toy

It may not be the most traditional Christmas theme, but which kid doesn’t love dinosaurs? With this innovative calendar, you’ll receive safety glasses, dino grow eggs, two dino excavation blocks, four jigsaw puzzles, two craft dyes, a volcano, air fry clay, and plenty more so you can build your own lab at home. Buy for the kid in your life who love science and always wants to watch The Land Before Time or Jurassic Park.

FAO Schwarz
$23.99
Buy Now

2021 Peppa Pig Holiday Advent Calendar for Kids, 24-Pieces

If your kid can’t get enough of that adorable little British pig Peppa, give them 24 days of joy with this 2021 holiday calendar. The whole family–Peppa Pig, George, Daddy Pig and Mummy Pig–are here, and they have everything from a doll house to a drum set to keep them busy ‘til Santa shows up with his sleigh.

Peppa Pig
$32.99
Buy Now

24 Day Advent Art Calendar

It’s not exactly a toy, but artistic minds young and mature alike will enjoy the daily inspiration to create when opening the packages in this calendar from Arteza. Inside you’ll find paint, markers, gel pens, watercolors, brushes, and more to get your family started on a picture-making journey to add something special to your countdown.

Arteza
$64.99
Buy Now

Barbie Advent Calendar

If your little one already has Barbie dolls to spare, treat them to a plethora of accessories with this signature hot pink advent calendar full of shoes, jewelry, sunglasses, and more fun accessories that help the original cool gal and all her friends live their most stylish doll lives.

Barbie
$49.99
Buy Now

item.title: Best cheap toasters for making breakfast on a budget
item.description: A toaster is a fairly mundane kitchen tool you’ll need, so why spend a tremendous amount of cash on such a simple appliance? We looked at some of the most affordable and popular models on the market for under $50, and we were pleased to find everything from fun, campy cartoon toasters to more stylis...
item.dc:creator: Kelsey Chapman
item.content:encoded:
A toaster is a fairly mundane kitchen tool you’ll need, so why spend a tremendous amount of cash on such a simple appliance?

We looked at some of the most affordable and popular models on the market for under $50, and we were pleased to find everything from fun, campy cartoon toasters to more stylish, sleek options all at a reasonable price point.

Whether you’re looking to chow down on a waffle emblazoned with Spongebob’s face or just want a nice, crisp bagel to start your day, keep scrolling to find our favorite cheap toasters and upgrade your kitchen on a budget.

You can trust our independent reviews. We may earn a commission from some of the retailers, but we never allow this to influence selections, which are formed from real-world testing, expert advice and our own research. This revenue helps to fund journalism acrossThe Independent.

iSiLER 2 Slice Toaster, 1.3 Inches Wide Slot Toaster

More than 2,000 ratings give this yellow two slice toaster a 4.5 average rating, making it a certified Amazon’s Choice product, not to mention a total standout from the sea of black and gray options out there. There are seven different toast shades to choose from so everyone can find a setting to love, and an easy-to-clean sliding tray pops out so you’ll never struggle to empty the crumbs.

iSiLER
$25.95
Buy Now

Keenstone Toaster 2 Slice Compact Bread Toaster

Retro lovers will flip over this icy blue, vintage looking option with wide slots, a removable crumb catching tray, and a high-lift lever perfect for snagging even the smallest pieces once they’re cooked.

“When I looked at the reviews before buying this I could not understand why many focused entirely on how it looked and not how it worked,” one reviewer who loves her choice wrote. “Now that we have it, I can totally understand this reaction. It really is gorgeous! Aesthetics aside, so far it is working well and making toast that is actually toasted the way we want... This is simple and has a little smaller footprint than other toasters I have had, which makes it easy to tuck under the cabinets and leave more counter space.”

Keenstone
$49.99
Buy Now

Proctor Silex 4 Slice Toaster

For families or couples who need their breakfast baked goods heated in a hurry, this four slice toaster does the trick for well under $50. Its sleek black and steel lines will look great on your countertop, and the cool-sided walls, extra high popup feature, and drop down crumb tray are a few other benefits that make this a great choice.

Proctor Silex
$32.99
Buy Now

Pioneer Woman 2 Slice Toaster

The inner workings are basic, but this toaster is built to wow with its beautiful blue and white floral pattern, designed to match a whole line of kitchenware available through The Pioneer Woman. Check out the cancel, defrost, bagel, and seven shading options as well on this well-rounded, under-$30 product.

The Pioneer Woman
$29.92
Buy Now

Disney® Classic Mickey 2-Slice Toaster

Perfect for families with little kids, or just folks who never let the little kid in their heart grow up, this Mickey Mouse toaster looks dashing on any countertop and leaves an imprint of the cartoon icon right there on your toast. Bonus: Beyond members (free to sign up) save $5, making this just $19.99 with the discount!

Disney
$24.99
Buy Now

KitchenSmith by BELLA 2 Slice Toaster

Anyone looking to cut the bells and whistles and save a ton of money will love this $12.99 option from Target. Wide slots, quick heating, and six shade settings give you everything you need while barely making a dent in your wallet.

KitchenSmith by BELLA
$12.99
Buy Now

SpongeBob SquarePants 2-Slice Toaster

Another fun cartoon option is this goofy Spongebob toaster with its bright yellow color and fun, adorable face. It’s a bit on the pricey side for a “cheap” toaster roundup, but who can resist taking a bite out of Bikini Bottom’s favorite resident every morning?

Nickelodeon
$49.99
Buy Now

Star Wars The Mandalorian The Child Mint Toaster

If Spongebob or Mickey aren’t quite your cup of tea but you still want something fun and novel, perhaps you’ll love this Mandalorian-themed toaster featuring everyone’s favorite character of the past few years: The Child aka baby Yoda. The mint green shade is surprisingly beautiful, but you’ll also be delighted every time you toast a waffle or bun and get to chomp down on the big-eyed cutie charred onto your food.

Note: This one tops out $50 limit after selling out at many places, but we thought the $3 extra was worth it to keep this cutie on the list when updating.

Star Wars
$55.06
Buy Now

Continental Professional Series 2-Slice Stainless Steel Wide Slot Toaster

For a more standard, stainless look, check out this Continental basic toaster that has extra-wide slots, a chic and timeless look, and a handy three year limited warranty all for a cost of under $40.

Continental
$39.41
Buy Now

Cuisinart 2-Slice Touchscreen Toaster

This one just barely squeaks in under the $50 limit we set, but it manages to do so while having a fancy touchscreen! Leave it to Cuisinart to create a state-of-the-art way to toast bread while looking sleek, cool, and ready to blend into the background of your counter without overwhelming the layout.

Cuisinart
$49.95
Buy Now

item.title: Best gifts to give a child on their first birthday
item.description: The toy market for young children is enormous, making it difficult to choose exactly the right thing when it’s time to gift a one year old on their birthday. Is it safe? Is it educational? Will it fall into a million pieces and make you the mortal enemy of the child’s parents? We asked all this and ...
item.dc:creator: Kelsey Chapman
item.content:encoded:
The toy market for young children is enormous, making it difficult to choose exactly the right thing when it’s time to gift a one year old on their birthday. Is it safe? Is it educational? Will it fall into a million pieces and make you the mortal enemy of the child’s parents?

We asked all this and more while talking to several childcare experts and parents about their favorite recommendations. The options they offered up range from classic playthings that never go out of style to books or toys with a more direct, modern educational purpose. Keep reading to see what sticks out to you and what you think the new toddler in your life might love the most.

You can trust our independent reviews. We may earn a commission from some of the retailers, but we never allow this to influence selections, which are formed from real-world testing, expert advice and our own research. This revenue helps to fund journalism across The Independent.

Ted and Tina Adopt a Kitten: T, D, N Sounds

Books are always a fantastic and fun option to gift children, as they are educational while entertaining, plus they’re easy to pass along to younger siblings or even friends with new babies later on. The author of this particular tome is Cass Kim, a Speech-Language Pathologist who has penned a series of these books promoting the use of different letters throughout the alphabet. Cass tells us:

“Children start attending to mouth movements for speech around 8 months of age - right around when they begin babbling. With mask-wearing being an important factor in public health, daycares, and schools, children are not getting the visual stimuli they need for speech - which means extra practice at home, in a fun, safe, entertaining manner is needed.”

While Ted, Tina, and their adopted kitten will teach your little ones how to use their T, D, and N sounds, make sure to check out the rest of the series where your tykes can learn about their W, M, P, and B sounds, as well as their K and G sounds.

Cass Kim M.A. CCC-SLP
$10.99
Buy Now

Fisher-Price Linkimals Smooth Moves Sloth

Ryan and Kara Youngberg are a married couple and parents who started babysjourney.com in order to help others gain knowledge on their child-rearing journey. They sent over a handful of suggestions that are currently going over very well in their household with young children, including this Fisher-Price Linkimals Sloth. As Ryan tells us:

“Our youngest will be a one year old in a couple of weeks and one of his favorite toys right now are the Fisher-Price Linkimals. They have 10 different animals with unique songs, sounds, and phrases that connect and interact with each other when placed nearby. He loves pushing the buttons and gets excited when he hears Sloth, Otter, Koala, & Moose singing and having fun together.”

Fisher-Price
$29.99
Buy Now

Hide N Side Kids Play Tunnels

If you ever had the time of your life crawling through the communal play space at a fast food restaurant but can’t imagine letting your little one follow suit in a post-Covid world, Ryan and Kara’s next suggestion will really catch your eye.

“Children love to explore and crawl through tunnels and small spaces,” Ryan says of the colorful, lightweight tube. “Your one year old will laugh as you play peekaboo with them while they’re inside or they’ll happily keep crawling through the tunnel. When they’re done, you can easily fold the tunnel up and store it anywhere.”

It’s also a budget-friendly option, and one where you won’t have to worry about the child receiving multiples as you can simply build a whole series of tunnels like a maze to explore! Ryan jokingly warns, “As a word of caution, older children and pets will be just as excited as your little one to play in the tunnel.”

Hide N Side
$19.99
Buy Now

Little Tikes Cozy Coupe 30th Anniversary Car, Non-Assembled, Standard Packaging

This next and last pick from Ryan and Kara is a recognizable staple that little kids everywhere go nuts over–the Little Tykes Cozy Coupe. If you’re a millennial or younger, you probably spent at least a little time in your childhood cruising around in one of these babies, so why not pass that fun gift down to your own kids?

“A product that both my one year old and four year old love is the Little Tikes Cozy Coupe,” says Ryan. “The car comes with a removable floor piece, which makes it perfect for children that can’t walk or reach the ground to push themselves. Their imaginations run wild as they cruise down the driveway and sidewalk in this adorable car. This gift is guaranteed to be played with for years to come.”

Little Tikes
$100.00
Buy Now

Elsie Girl Friend Doll with Face Mask

Bunnies By The Bay produce some of the cutest, softest plushes and dolls out there, and we’re over the moon for this modern choice for gifting a young child.

Elsie is an especially cute doll outfitted in soft, pastel pink with her very own mask to encourage both children and adults to do their part to help during the pandemic and beyond. While one year olds aren’t quite ready to wear masks themselves, it’s never too early to normalize healthy hygiene practices, and plenty of folks agree masks should absolutely be part of our normal lives during flu season or when we need to be in public while sick from here on out.

In addition to normalizing the practice, Elsie’s mask makes her unique to this period in history and will be a useful learning tool for when children grow a bit older and can start asking questions. As Bunnies By The Bay says, “Elsie Doll is a great way to help and explain to kids how to wear masks, making them feel more comfortable,” adding that despite the timeliness of this particular toy, she and the rest of the company’s beautiful toys are “very timeless and classic.”

Make sure to check our their customizable gifts as well, and consider purchasing something personalized to create a lasting and precious memory for years to come.

Bunnies By The Bay
$34.95
Buy Now

Custom Catch Personalized Teddy Bear Baby Blanket Gift for Boy - Blue

As CEO and founder of WeThrift, a site dedicated to hunting down coupons and deals to save buyers as much money as possible, Nick Drewe has plenty of expertise when it comes to knowing the market for baby gifts. His suggestion is a must-have that will please kids now and store nicely for parents who want to hold onto precious memories in the future.

“These animal-themed blankets from Custom Catch combined a teddy bear and a favorite blanket all in one,” Nicks tells us. “The huggable bear makes it easier for a one-year-old to grab and cuddle, which is a nice developmentally appropriate tactile detail. Make these blankets even more special by adding their name and birthday date to the fabric for an extra personal touch.”

Custom Catch
$29.95
Buy Now

Radio Flyer Classic Push & Play Walker, Toddler Walker with Activity Play, Ages 1-4

Leo Young, father of two and founder and editor of OptimizedFamily.com, shared his ideal gift for a one year old in the form of a Radio Flyer Class Push & Play, a toy designed to both help the growing tyke learn the coordination skills useful for walking while providing visual and tactile stimuli via the activity center right in front of them.

“At the age of one, most kids will be venturing into the toddling stage,” Leo explains, “so an ideal gift would be something that encourages - and aids - them to practice that new skill, and makes it fun! This Walker by RADIO FLYER is perfect for your baby to push and pull with satisfyingly clicking wheels and has an activity board built in that will keep them usefully occupied during breaks!”

Radio Flyer
$59.99
Buy Now

Stacking Garden Friends

Donna Bloss has an impressive recipe that includes being the CMO at Thrive Cuisine and a writer with a focus in sustainability, veganism, and motherhood, but what really makes her the expert on toys for youngins is the fact that she has four of her own–all under the age of 5! Trusting that level of experience, we took her recommendation to heart:

“Stacking toys are definitely the way to go. At one years of age a child is developing their motor skills. They are also seeking a challenge and can easily bore with soft toys. I always prefer wooden toys as they are natural, and often end up in baby’s mouth!”

She sent us to Oompa.com, a favorite site of hers with plenty of toys to choose from, with the specific suggestion to check out the adorable Garden Friends above. These stackers promise to “encourage logical thinking and inspire imaginative play,” and they’re also a breeze to pick up for parents and come with their own drawstring storage bag.

Oompa
$25.00
Buy Now

YGJT Baby Balance Bikes

This adorable bike is perfect for the fledgling rider whose motor skills aren’t quite up to par but ambitions are high. In addition to helping children develop balance and having a sturdy carbon steel frame, the spotty dog’s eyes blink as the handlebars move and setup takes on a couple of minutes.

“I purchased this for a 1 year old boy’s first birthday party,” says one satisfied buyer among thousands of positive reviews. “The mom said of all his gifts, this puppy is the one he could not stop playing with. He squealed when he saw it. Easy for him to use and operate!”

YGJT
$54.99
Buy Now

Making Faces: A First Book of Emotions

Sydney Griffith is a mother of two, including a little one who just passed her first birthday a few months back. She offered up Making Faces, an interactive photo board book that introduces five essential expressions to your growing baby.

“Making Faces is one of our favorite board books,” Sydney explains. “My daughter loves seeing other babies, and there’s a mirror at the end so she can practice her own facial expressions.”

Abrams Appleseed
$7.95
Buy Now

Pop Blocs Farm Animals Learning Toy

Sydney also suggested these adorable farm animal toys for a one year old, telling us:

“Pop blocs are so great for learning about animals and their sounds, as well as developing fine motor skills. We have a lot of fun mixing and matching to create silly creatures.”

The creatures are made of soft plastic that’s malleable and easy to pop into place to help refine children’s “sensory, fine motor, gross motor, logical, creative, emotional, and self-esteem” skills, according to Pop Blocs.

Pop Blocs
$19.49
Buy Now

Learning Resources Hoot the Fine Motor Owl, Color, Shapes and Number Development, Scissor Skills, 6 Pieces, Ages 18 Months +

Erin Vollmer is a certified and licensed pediatric speech language pathologist and co-founder at TherapyWorks , where a recent piece on Toddler Toys was published (read here).

While several options from those recommendations are great, our personal favorite was this cute Hoot Owl whose colors, shapes, and numbers contain hours and hours of fun playtime for little ones that will help refine motor skills, coordination, hand strength, and scissor skills. It’s recommended for kids 18 months and up, so parents may want to practice a bit extra caution at first but do so knowing this toy will continue to grow with the child long after they rip off the birthday paper.

Learning Resources
$14.99
Buy Now

item.title: Best women’s activewear pieces for working out in style
item.description: The new year and its usual resolutions are well under way at this point, and with springtime fast approaching, it’s time for many to amp up their workout wardrobe for looking great while sweating it out. It’s easy to fall into the rut of throwing on the same tired sweats, but feeling good about how ...
item.dc:creator: Kelsey Chapman
item.content:encoded:
The new year and its usual resolutions are well under way at this point, and with springtime fast approaching, it’s time for many to amp up their workout wardrobe for looking great while sweating it out. It’s easy to fall into the rut of throwing on the same tired sweats, but feeling good about how you look can help boost your mood and confidence and give you the energy you need to give it your all. 

We looked at hundreds of stylish options on the market and even asked vendors to send in some favorites, and the choices below reflect some upcoming trends we noticed in activewear that will have you looking fresh this season and beyond. Whether it’s a rich blue sports bra with ferocious staying power or a windbreaker that calls up 90s street fashion, here are our favorite women’s activewear pieces for spring 2021.

You can trust our independent reviews. We may earn a commission from some of the retailers, but we never allow this to influence selections, which are formed from real-world testing, expert advice and our own research. This revenue helps to fund journalism across The Independent.

Tigress Sports Bra

-

Featuring a ferocious tiger graphic and stunning sapphire color, this sports bra is a great option for those who like to show a little skin while working out but also need support.

BeReal generously sent one of these bras over for testing to show the real support provided with this option. The fabric feels expensive and deliciously smooth, and the bra provides a snug fit for small (as seen on the model above) and ample busts (a la this cardio-addicted writer) alike. While those of us on the larger end of the spectrum may experience a bit of, eh, squishing, the thin pads inside for lining are easily moved to the side to give more of a lift than a smoosh, plus nothing is ever at risk of falling out unexpectedly.

There’s also no excessive cutting into the areas around the arms and back, and wearing something this bright and fun adds an instant boost to any workout.  Definitely invest in one of these sports bras if you want to feel good before, during, and after your workout, and grab the matching leggings for a complete look. 

BeReal Wear
$40.99
Buy Now

SEASUM Women Yoga Jumpsuit Backless One Piece Workout Catsuit Bodysuit Sleeveless Textured Gym Bodycon Romper

-

A workout catsuit sounds daunting, but the stretch of the fabric and intensely flattering cut will put you at ease in no time. The "Brazilian bubble" design fabric conceals lumps and bumps while smoothing any bulges, and the halter neckline makes this a great piece of athleisure that goes from the yoga mat to the grocery store without losing an ounce of attitude. Another bonus: There are more than 30 color options available, so you don’t have to commit to the leopard option we love if it’s too loud for your tastes.

SEASUM
$20.99
Buy Now

Bandelettes Patented Trademarked Original Elastic Anti-Chafing Thigh Bands

-

Anyone with thighs that even remotely touch while you’re walking will know the pain of so-called “chub rub” once you add a little heat and friction to the equation. Patented Bandettes counteract this issue by providing a non-slip fabric barrier to prevent skin-on-skin contact that causes unsightly redness and intense pain, both things that might prevent you from being enthusiastic about your workout.

While designed for slipping on under dresses and shorts in warmer weather for daily use, these are a lifesaver for wearing during long walks or runs once the weather starts warming up. They come in a variety of colors and fabrics, even in a sexy lace pattern, so snag a few pairs for your every mood and outfit and never suffer the soreness of inner thigh chafing again.

Bandelettes
$18.95
Buy Now

Swale Zip Hoodie

-

Blue is quite the on-trend color for Spring 2021, and this hoodie that can work for casual daily wear or a workout is proof positive it’s a good one. Made of 100% certified organic cotton, the creative but dainty graphics strewn across it represent the elements and thus are meant to symbolically link “the purification of water to the beauty of the environment as a whole,” according to Able Made.

The company’s founder Suzanne created a youth soccer foundation to honor her late husband after losing him to cardiac arrest while playing the game he loved so much, followed by Able Made to provide financial support. All products are created locally to “love, last, and make a difference,” and you can read more on their wonderful back story here before investing in a piece like the one above. 

Able Made
$90.00
Buy Now

Nike Training Pro 365 3inch shorts with pink waistband in black

-

Once things start heating up during your workout, you’ll be thrilled by the breathability and naked skin you get with these great short shorts.

Featuring Nike’s super soft Pro fabric and Dri-FIT technology, sweat won’t be an issue as it is wicked away from the skin and quickly evaporated through the fabic. Four-way stretch means you’re never bound or dealing with a too-tight fit, and the figure hugging look will let your confidence shine.

Nike
$30.00
Buy Now

3D Trefoil Track Jacket

-

What better for spring than a classic light jacket in a cheery pink color that reflects the blooming season? An adjustable hem and elastic cuffs make this track favorite customizable to fit your body perfectly, and only high-performance recyclable materials were used in its making, perfect for the eco-conscious wearer. Buy with the matching pants for head-to-toe coordination. 

Adidas
$80.00
Buy Now

ASOS 4505 sparkle sports set in black

-

Clever contouring through color works on everything from makeup to clothing to give the illusion of a more chiseled shape, but this glam workout set from ASOS takes it to a whole new level by adding glitter to the equation.

The V-neck bra is a pull-on style with no pesky wires (so you won’t get poked mid-run), and the figure-hugging leggings feature an elastic waist and stretch throughout for a flattering look that moves effortlessly with your body throughout the workout.

ASOS
$80.00
Buy Now

Nike Women’s Dri-FIT Basketball Shorts

-

For those who prefer their workout wear less revealing and tight, these Nike basketball shorts are a fantastic choice with the same DRI-Fit tech as the Nike shorts above with less restriction. An adjustable elastic waistband lets you cinch them as needed to keep them from falling down while you’re active, plus you can choose from four great basic colors.

Nike
$22.97
Buy Now

Women’s Contour Power Waist High-Waisted Leggings with Stash Pocket

-

You can never have too many pairs of basic, stretchy yoga pants and these come in varying lengths to accommodate a variety of heights. The three neutral color options have your bases covered, so order in all three to build up your workout basics.

All In Motion
$25.00
Buy Now

Athletic Works Women’s Core Active Dri-Works Skort

-

Tennis and 90s nostalgia lovers rejoice! There’s a skort made of breathable fabric featuring a reflective logo for safety and a pocket in four different colors for just $12.96 each. An adjustable waistband adds comfort, as do the matching slits on either side that prevent the fabric from minimizing your range of motion.

Athletic Works
$12.96
Buy Now

Zipper Half Placket Drawstring Hem Wind Jacket

-

As seen on the model, this windbreaker looks amazing with a big pair of hoops (like a pair we suggest in this piece on jewelry we love) but works as a light layer to protect you from blustery spring winds while getting in your outdoor workout. Reviews average out to 4.9 out of 5 stars so you know it’s a buyer favorite, but many suggest sizing up since there’s no stretch and you’ll most likely be moving a lot in it.

Shein
$16.00
Buy Now

Tie Dye Textured Crop Sports Tee & Leggings

-

Tie dye continues to be “in” this upcoming season, so buy into the trend and look like the clouds on a sunny day in this textured two-piece set. The waffled fabric is super forgiving, and reviewers rave about the material’s thickness and quality, especially for such a low price.

Shein
$20.00
Buy Now

item.title: Best fragrances for women to help you smell lovely all year
item.description: The finishing touch to any good look is the confidence to carry it off, and the quickest way to liven up that self-conviction is a good spritz of your favorite scent. Since smell is one of the most powerful connections to our brain’s pleasure centers and memories, the perfume you choose can not only...
item.dc:creator: Kelsey Chapman
item.content:encoded:
The finishing touch to any good look is the confidence to carry it off, and the quickest way to liven up that self-conviction is a good spritz of your favorite scent. Since smell is one of the most powerful connections to our brain’s pleasure centers and memories, the perfume you choose can not only evoke certain emotions in those around, it can define entire eras of your life.

Another aspect to this daily ritual is the aesthetic of the bottle you choose. Of course chemistry and scent are most important, but having a gorgeous piece of useful art never hurt anyone’s mood as they prepare for the day. Much of life is blandly utilitarian; treat yourself to a pleasing trinket that functions to complete your readying process.

Taking these factors into account, we’ve looked at some of the best perfumes on the market that are new and classic to get the scoop on how to smell your best. Whether you like something slinky and warm that sits on the skin like invisible velvet or you’re more of a bubbly, floral type, your tastes are surely represented in the varied and enchanting choices below.

Since you're shopping for perfume, round out your fragrance purchases by checking out our favorite online beauty stores so you can refresh your whole beauty collection.

You can trust our independent reviews. We may earn a commission from some of the retailers, but we never allow this to influence selections, which are formed from real-world testing, expert advice and our own research. This revenue helps to fund journalism across The Independent.

Tous Love Me 3.0 oz Eau de Parfum

Tous' delightfully femme fragrance may beg, "love me" but it's hardly a chore to do so.

Romance abounds with the muted pink box bearing the crystalline teddy bear shape of the bottle itself on the textured facade. The bottle itself catches the light beautifully, echoing the pink theme with its faceted construction topped with an interesting pull-off top in silver.

Scent-wise, what you see is what you get: bold notes of grapefruit, pink pepper (it's truly a theme), and lychee are embedded in this floral daydream. It mellows only a bit after several minutes, with softer undertones of jasmine, cedarwood, and perhaps the slightest hint of vanilla seep through.

This bottle is for the ultimate girly girl who loves getting flowers, wearing dresses, and decorating her space with only the most ladylike adornments.

Tous
$110.00
Buy Now

Glossier You

We love Glossier (as we’ve mentioned) and how personalized, simple, and clean everything from their aesthetics to wearability are in every product. This is true for You, their signature fragrance, too, and its notes of pink pepper, amber, and white florals. It’s designed to be “open-ended,” which means basically it will transform to smell distinctly “you” as the simple mix of scents blends into your body chemistry.

Glossier
$60.00
Buy Now

REPLICA by the Fireplace

Billed as the perfect autumnal fragrance, this warm and spicy blend evokes the comfort of a crackling fire with notes of clove oil, chestnut, and vanilla. This is also a unisex scent, making it in ideal gift for anyone in your life who thrives in the year's later months and enjoys the feeling of a sweater or snuggly blanket as much as they do smelling delicious.

Mason Margiela
$135.00
Buy Now

Scarlet Poppy Cologne Intense

Luxurious and velvety, the scent of poppies will fill the air around you with opulent sweetness, mystery, and just a touch of fig to round things out in this new Jo Malone fragrance. We’re a sucker for a red bottle, too, and this one is an especially stunning shade of scarlet (in keeping with its namesake).

Jo Malone London
$138.00
Buy Now

Banana Republic Icon Metal Rain 2.5 oz Eau de Parfum

Right off the bat, there's something tremendously appealing about the steely appearance of the dark gray box in which Metal Rain arrives. Banana Republic is well known for their chic minimalism, but this scent takes that to the next level aesthetically and aromatically.

As you tug the black ribbon that slides the parfum from its hearty chamber, the bottle appears looking simple and androgynous. The scent itself is similarly genderless and comes on strong at first with top notes of basil and citrus. It mellows at a steady pace, settling on wafts of lavender, green tea, and "ozone," according to the description, but to the layman's nose it reads heady and seductive.

This is an excellent choice for those who love an air of mystery in their scent and aren't concerned with an overtly gendered bouquet. The bottle will look smart on any vanity shelf, so pick it up for yourself or a loved one who enjoys sexy scents with an edge.

Banana Republic
$85.00
Buy Now

Burberry Her Intense Eau de Parfum

Burberry’s scents are possibly as iconic as their signature plaid and trench coats, and this newer release Her Intense continues that legacy of bold sophistication through a complex mixture of blackberry, cherry, violent, jasmine, and hints of cedarwood to finish. As one buyer reports,:

“The notes transition relatively quickly on me, but it does seem to have substantial wear time, especially the base with the lingering blackberry and jasmine facets. A lovely fragrance!”

Burberry
$103.00
Buy Now

Olfactory NYC Explorer Box

The Explorer Box is a fantastic treat to introduce you to the nine spectacular core scents that introduce you to the Olfactory NYC experience while setting you back less than $20 with an $18 credit for when you decide which 50mL version you’d like to bring home once you’ve sniffed them all.

While lingering over the small, colorful box, I scribbled down notes like, “Blake is cultured sophistication with an almost vintage finish settled inside the perky top notes,” and, “Lulu is a melange of girly scents that bring back shopping with my friends at the mall and running into the girl I envy the most–I imagine she stills smells this good.”

Hunter might be my favorite; the musky, raw vanilla in that bold little bottle is the perfect scent to wear while finally seducing a forbidden crush or just reigniting flames with a longtime lover.

Olfactory NYC
$18.00
Buy Now

Yves Saint Laurent Black Opium Eau de Parfum Neon

Many of us had mothers and grandmothers who bathed in the powerfully luxurious–if a tad overwhelming–Black Opium as they matured. The amber liquid’s lasting glamour has received a vibrant update with the new eau de parfum Neon version, complete with an overhauled bottle that lets the wearer gaze into a brilliant pink window centered on the bottle’s bubbly, textured surface.

Coffee, orange blossom, and dragon fruit are among the top notes listed in this newcomer’s melange of scenets, and satisfied buyers praise its spicy, long-lasting wearability that doesn’t overpower the body’s natural chemistry.

Yves Saint Laurent
$78.00
Buy Now

Marc Jacobs Daisy Love Eau de Toilette

Marc Jacobs Daisy has been a go-to scent for the funky, fun, and free-spirited type of fashionista for years, so this limited edition is an obvious pick for those who want to embody that spirit with the added intensity of apricot and golden amber to deepen the floral notes.

The bottle is a true collectible bit of art as well, featuring the iconic MJ daisy atop the apricot-hued glass bottle with a gold button in the middle to set it all off–a true delight to see on any bathroom or vanity shelf.

Marc Jacobs Fragrances
$60.00
Buy Now

Tom Ford Lost Cherry

The scent of cherries conjures something deliciously fruity and luscious for many, but Tom Ford would never allow his namesake to produce a fragrance that gets by on sweetness alone. This full-bodied luxe eau de parfum adds elements of almond and tonka bean to its top notes before Turkish Rose and jasmine saunter in to give it sensual staying power.

The bottle is another point of consideration, deep red and sophisticated in its simplicity. A pale pink label evokes cherry blossoms as well, leaving off the fine print for a gorgeous adornment for any shelf or vanity.

Tom Ford
$368.00
Buy Now

Chanel Chance Eau Tendre Eau de Toilette

Few can deny the power of Chanel scents, as they were popularized by great beauties of the past such as Marilyn Monroe when she famously claimed the designer’s #5 perfume was all she wore to bed. You can still buy that classic perfume should you be tied to tradition, but one beautifully modern and chic alternative comes via Chanel’s Chanel Eau Tendre.

Hued like pink lemonade and spiced with fresh teakwood and jasmine, this casually glamorous floral is perfect for daintier types who love sunny picnics, prissy pearls, and all the accoutrement befitting a proper lady.

Chanel
$115.00
Buy Now

Etat Libre D'Orange I Am Trash

If you are not one to take yourself seriously and act precious about the scent you wear, I Am Trash is the offbeat scent you’ve waited for your whole life. Upcycled ingredients like “exhausted Rose petals, already distilled Sandalwood chips, and even leftover Apples from the food industry” are united into a distinct and formidable scent, one not easily forgotten that induces curiosity and tenderness in this fruity, woodsy citrus scent.

If you’re enamored with the concept of using garbage to create something delicious such as this but don’t want to fully commit, consider grabbing a $4 sample to start before committing to a larger spend.

Etat Libre D'Orange
$159.00
Buy Now

Banana Republic Icon Grassland 2.5 oz Eau de Parfum

We're including two Banana Republic fragrances here because both are so effortlessly cool but one is just a bit more bold: Grassland.

The packaging color is the first clue to the scent inside being a bit bolder than our previous entry. When first sprayed, the scent packs a strong punch of fresh mint, bergamot, and apple. It quickly settles down, though, and the slow release of warmth via subtle spices and florals.

Wearing this fragrance for several minutes is a relaxing experience, and one that is much more long lasting than those perfumes that seemingy disappear to the wearer shortly after spritzing. You'll maintain awareness of this one as it seeps into your skin, and you won't be a single bit mad at the outcome.

Grassland is perfect for someone who enjoys the streamlined look of Metal Rain's bottle with a green twist, especially if they're looking for a more animated nose. If you're feeling extra generous, gift both Banana Republic scents to someone very special and treat them to a bundle equipped to complement changing moods.

Banana Republic
$85.00
Buy Now

Tom Ford Velvet Orchid

Purple is the color of royalty, and that’s exactly what you’ll feel like each day when you reach for this stunning bottle and mist yourself in Tom Ford’s exemplary and top-selling fragrance Velvet Orchid.

The formula is based on the designer’s legendary Black Orchid, a favorite of brand loyals since its introduction in 2006, but with an updated profile that leans more feminine without losing the headiness of the original’s musky appeal. Pay attention to the oriental florals, honey, citrus, and rum–this is for the bold, literary woman who prefers Scotch to champagne.

Tom Ford
$136.00
Buy Now

Christian Siriano Ooh La Rouge

Christian Siriano’s couture work has become synonymous with dressing some of the most adored bodies on the planet in regal, show-stopping pieces for red carpets everywhere, and now he’s brought his signature classy edge to fragrance.

Pomare's Stolen Perfume Sample Set

Pomare’s Stolen Perfume is a fascinating line of fragrances with a story that travels the globe from France to Tahiti to Australia to Mexico using all natural elements to form bouquets redolent of centuries past.

The sample set is the easiest way to smell the whole adventure for yourself before deciding on a favorite chapter, but the journey from Beulah to Piano Turner whiffs of romance, earth, vanilla, and sandalwood, assembled by a maker with a nose for wine who wanted to imbue wearable scent with that same magical experience.

An emphasis on natural scent is explained through an allegory in which you have eaten cherry flavored candy all your life then one day taste a real cherry.

“It would not be as ‘loud’ a flavor as the chemical version,” the website explains, “but soon you would discover layers and dimensions to what you once thought the flavor cherry meant.” Pomare’s perfumes are sold seasonally as no two seasons of the ingredients will ever smell precisely the same, so indulge here for a beautifully unique fragrance that will never be captured quite the same way again.
